RECIPE 274: Watermelon Summer Salad
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 6
Yield: 6 servings
Prep Time: 30 mins
Total Time: 30 mins
Rating: 4.3/5
Category: /Salad/Fruit Salad Recipes/

INGREDIENTS:
• ¾ cup halved
• thinly sliced red onion
• 1 tablespoon fresh lime juice
• 1 ½ quarts seeded
• cubed watermelon
• ¾ cup crumbled feta cheese
• ½ cup pitted black olive halves
• 1 cup chopped fresh mint
• 2 tablespoons olive oil

DIRECTIONS:
1. Place the onion slices in a small bowl with the lime juice
2. The acid of the lime will mellow the flavor of the raw onion
3. Let stand for 10 minutes
4. In a large bowl, combine the watermelon cubes, feta cheese, black olives, onions with the lime juice, and mint
5. Drizzle olive oil over it all, and toss to blend
6. Dig in and be prepared for a pleasant surprise!

NUTRITION INFO:
Total Fat 10g 13%, Saturated Fat 4g 18%, Cholesterol 17mg 6%, Sodium 315mg 14%, Total Carbohydrate 15g 5%, Dietary Fiber 1g 5%, Total Sugars 11g, Protein 4g, Vitamin C 17mg 85%, Calcium 126mg 10%, Iron 1mg 6%, Potassium 215mg 5%

Source: https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/74824/watermelon-summer-salad/

============================================================

RECIPE 275: Cantaloupe Crunch
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 9
Yield: 1 9-inch pan
Prep Time: 15 mins
Cook Time: 45 mins
Total Time: 1 hrs
Rating: 4.1/5
Category: /Desserts/Cakes/Cake Mix Cake Recipes/

INGREDIENTS:
• 3 cups cubed cantaloupe
• ½ cup white sugar
• ⅓ cup lemon juice
• 2 tablespoons unsalted butter
• melted
• 1 tablespoon all-purpose flour
• ½ teaspoon vanilla extract
• ½ teaspoon ground cinnamon
• ¼ teaspoon ground nutmeg
• 1 (15.25 ounce) package white cake mix
• ½ cup unsalted butter
• melted

DIRECTIONS:
1. Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
2. Mix cantaloupe, sugar, lemon juice, 2 tablespoons melted butter, flour, vanilla, cinnamon, and nutmeg together in a medium bowl
3. Pour into a 9-inch square baking dish
4. Spread dry cake mix evenly over cantaloupe mixture, then drizzle 1/2 cup melted butter over top
5. Bake in the preheated oven until golden brown, about 45 minutes

NUTRITION INFO:
Total Fat 19g 24%, Saturated Fat 9g 46%, Cholesterol 34mg 11%, Sodium 477mg 21%, Total Carbohydrate 61g 22%, Dietary Fiber 1g 4%, Total Sugars 46g, Protein 3g, Vitamin C 24mg 120%, Calcium 120mg 9%, Iron 1mg 6%, Potassium 226mg 5%

Source: https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/89028/cantaloupe-crunch/

============================================================

RECIPE 276: Chewy Watermelon Rind Candy
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 12
Yield: 12 servings
Prep Time: 20 mins
Cook Time: 10 mins
Total Time: 6 hrs 30 mins
Rating: 3.5/5
Category: /Desserts/Candy Recipes/

INGREDIENTS:
• 1 watermelon rind
• peeled
• 4 cups water
• 4 cups white sugar
• ½ cup spearmint leaves
• coarsely chopped
• 1 tablespoon dried sweet basil

DIRECTIONS:
1. Cut watermelon rind into 2-inch long, 1-inch wide, and 1/2-inch thick pieces
2. Combine water, sugar, spearmint, and basil in a large pot
3. Bring to a rolling boil
4. Strain out spearmint and basil
5. Add watermelon rind, making sure pieces are completely immersed
6. Cook until rind is soft, about 5 minutes
7. Drain watermelon pieces and arrange in a single layer on dehydrator trays
8. Dry according to manufacturer's instructions until pieces are candied and dried, 6 to 8 hours

NUTRITION INFO:
Total Fat 2g 2%, Saturated Fat 0g 1%, Sodium 11mg 0%, Total Carbohydrate 94g 34%, Dietary Fiber 2g 8%, Total Sugars 67g, Protein 3g, Vitamin C 37mg 183%, Calcium 46mg 4%, Iron 1mg 7%, Potassium 464mg 10%

Source: https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/254421/chewy-watermelon-rind-candy/

============================================================

------------------------------------------------------------

Yield: 4 margaritas

• 1 tablespoon vodka
• 1 tablespoon orange liqueur

DIRECTIONS:
1. Combine watermelon, ice, tequila, sugar, lime juice, vodka, and orange liqueur in a blender; blend well
2. Pour margaritas into glasses

NUTRITION INFO:

RECIPE 280: Watermelon Rind Candy
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 100
Yield: 14 to 1 - pint jars
Prep Time: 1 hrs
Cook Time: 15 mins
Total Time: 10 days 1 hrs 15 mins
Rating: 5.0/5
Category: /Desserts/Candy Recipes/

INGREDIENTS:
• 2 ½ gallons water
• 1 tablespoon salt
• 2 gallons watermelon rind
• white part only
• cut into 1-inch cubes
• 1 quart cider vinegar
• 26 cups white sugar
• divided
• 28 whole cloves
• 14 (3 inch) cinnamon stick

DIRECTIONS:
1. Bring the water and salt to a boil in a large, enamel stockpot over high heat
2. Add the watermelon rinds, and return to a boil
3. Cook for 20 minutes, then drain the rinds in a colander
4. Bring the vinegar to a boil with 6 cups of sugar
5. Remove from the heat, stir in the watermelon rinds, cover, and let stand overnight
6. The following day, remove the rinds from the syrup using a slotted spoon, and place them into a clean bowl
7. Set the stockpot onto the stove over high heat, add 4 cups of sugar, and return the syrup to a boil
8. Once the sugar has dissolved, remove the stockpot from the heat, and stir in the watermelon rinds, cover, and let stand overnight
9. On day 3, repeat the process above, using only 2 cups of sugar: remove the rinds from the syrup using a slotted spoon, and place them into a clean bowl
10. Set the stockpot onto the stove over high heat, add 2 cups of sugar, and return the syrup to a boil
11. Once the sugar has dissolved, remove the stockpot from the heat, and stir in the watermelon rinds, cover, and let stand overnight
12. Repeat step 3 every day for 6 more days
13. On day 10, sterilize the canning jars, rings and lids in boiling water
14. Pack the watermelon rinds into sterilized jars, making sure there are no spaces or air pockets on the sides
15. Add two cloves and one cinnamon stick to each jar
16. Return the syrup to a boil, and fill the jars to within 1/4 inch of the top
17. Top with lids, and screw on rings
18. Place a rack in the bottom of a large stockpot and fill halfway with boiling water
19. Carefully lower jars into pot using a holder
20. Leave a 2 inch space between jars
21. Pour in more boiling water if necessary, until tops of jars are covered by 2 inches of water
22. Bring water to a full boil, cover the pot, and process for 10 to 15 minutes
23. Remove the stockpot from the heat, and let the jars stand in the water for 2 hours off of the heat
24. Remove the jars from the stockpot and place onto a cloth-covered or wood surface, several inches apart, until cool
25. Once cool, press the top of each lid with a finger, ensuring that the seal is tight (lid does not move up or down at all)
26. Store in a cool, dark area for 2 weeks before opening

NUTRITION INFO:
Total Fat 0g 0%, Sodium 75mg 3%, Total Carbohydrate 56g 20%, Dietary Fiber 1g 2%, Total Sugars 52g, Protein 0g, Vitamin C 5mg 24%, Calcium 15mg 1%, Iron 0mg 1%, Potassium 68mg 1%

Source: https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/168521/watermelon-rind-candy/

============================================================

RECIPE 281: Agua Fresca
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 2
Yield: 2 servings
Prep Time: 5 mins
Total Time: 5 mins
Rating: 4.6/5
Category: /Cuisine/Latin American/Mexican/

INGREDIENTS:
• 1 ½ cups water
• 3 slices cantaloupe
• peeled and seeded

• 1 cup ice cubes

DIRECTIONS:
1. Place water, cantaloupe, and sugar in a blender; blend until smooth
2. Divide ice into two glasses and pour cantaloupe mixture over ice

NUTRITION INFO:
Total Fat 0g 0%, Saturated Fat 0g 1%, Sodium 22mg 1%, Total Carbohydrate 46g 17%, Dietary Fiber 1g 3%, Total Sugars 45g, Protein 1g, Vitamin C 38mg 190%, Calcium 15mg 1%, Iron 0mg 1%, Potassium 279mg 6%

Source: https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/230153/agua-fresca/

RECIPE 282: Watermelon-Cucumber Agua Fresca
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 4
Yield: 4 agua frescas
Prep Time: 15 mins
Total Time: 1 hrs 15 mins
Rating: 4.0/5
Category: /Drinks Recipes/Mocktail Recipes/

INGREDIENTS:
• 4 cups cubed seeded watermelon
• 2 ½ cups water
• divided
• 1 cup peeled
• chopped cucumber
• ¼ cup freshly squeezed lime juice
• 1 tablespoon white sugar
• 1 teaspoon chili-lime seasoning (such as Tajin®)
• 1 wedge fresh lime
• ice as needed
• 4 slices watermelon
• 4 slices lime

DIRECTIONS:
1. Place watermelon and 1 1/2 cups water in a blender, and process at high speed until combined, about 1 minute
2. Add cucumber, lime juice, and sugar; blend until smooth
3. Pour mixture through a fine mesh strainer and using a spatula, press to remove the pulp
4. Don't skip this step, it's important
5. Pour the strained mixture into a large pitcher, add remaining 1 cup water, and stir well
6. Refrigerate for at least 1 hour or longer
7. Sprinkle some Tajin® (chili lime seasoning) onto a small plate
8. Run the lime wedge around the top of the glass, invert the glass, and dip the rim into the seasoning
9. Fill the glass with ice, pour in the agua fresca, garnish with watermelon slices or wedges, and lime slices

NUTRITION INFO:
Total Fat 1g 1%, Saturated Fat 0g 1%, Sodium 110mg 5%, Total Carbohydrate 40g 14%, Dietary Fiber 2g 8%, Total Sugars 31g, Protein 3g, Vitamin C 44mg 219%, Calcium 46mg 4%, Iron 1mg 7%, Potassium 568mg 12%

Source: https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/285328/watermelon-cucumber-agua-fresca/

============================================================

RECIPE 284: Cantaloupe Bread with Praline Glaze
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 20
Yield: 2 9x5-inch loaves
Prep Time: 15 mins
Cook Time: 1 hrs 5 mins
Total Time: 2 hrs 20 mins
Rating: 4.5/5
Category: /Bread/Quick Bread Recipes/Fruit Bread Recipes/

INGREDIENTS:
• 2 cups white sugar
• 2 cups cantaloupe - peeled
• seeded and pureed
• 1 cup vegetable oil
• 3 large eggs
• 1 tablespoon vanilla extract
• 3 cups all-purpose flour
• 2 teaspoons ground cinnamon
• 1 teaspoon baking soda
• 1 teaspoon salt
• ¾ teaspoon baking powder
• ½ teaspoon ground ginger

DIRECTIONS:
1. Preheat the oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C)
2. Lightly grease and flour two 9x5-inch loaf pans
3. Beat together sugar, puréed cantaloupe, oil, eggs, and vanilla in a large bowl until well combined
4. Sift together flour, cinnamon, baking soda, salt, baking powder, and ginger in a separate bowl
5. Stir flour mixture into cantaloupe mixture until combined
6. Divide batter evenly between the prepared pans
7. Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into the centers of loaves comes out clean, about 1 hour
8. Meanwhile, make sauce: Combine brown sugar and butter in a microwave-safe bowl
9. Cook in the microwave for 3 minutes, stirring at 1-minute intervals
10. Mix in pecans
11. Pour sauce over warm loaves
12. Let cool for 1 hour before serving

NUTRITION INFO:
Total Fat 18g 24%, Saturated Fat 5g 26%, Cholesterol 40mg 13%, Sodium 242mg 11%, Total Carbohydrate 48g 18%, Dietary Fiber 1g 4%, Total Sugars 33g, Protein 3g, Vitamin C 6mg 29%, Calcium 32mg 2%, Iron 1mg 7%, Potassium 103mg 2%

Source: https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/22309/cantaloupe-bread-with-praline-glaze/

============================================================

RECIPE 285: Watermelon Pie
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 8
Yield: 1 to 9 - inch pie
Rating: 4.3/5
Category: /Desserts/Pies/No-Bake Pie Recipes/

INGREDIENTS:
• 1 (3 ounce) package watermelon flavored Jell-O®
• ¼ cup water
• 1 (12 ounce) container frozen whipped topping
• thawed
• 2 cups watermelon
• 1 (9 inch) prepared graham cracker crust

DIRECTIONS:
1. Mix together the watermelon gelatin and water
2. Fold gelatin mixture into the dessert topping
3. Add cut watermelon
4. Pour mixture into graham cracker crust
5. Cool in refrigerator for about 3 hours

NUTRITION INFO:
Total Fat 18g 23%, Saturated Fat 11g 54%, Sodium 206mg 9%, Total Carbohydrate 41g 15%, Dietary Fiber 1g 2%, Total Sugars 33g, Protein 3g, Vitamin C 3mg 16%, Calcium 12mg 1%, Iron 1mg 4%, Potassium 76mg 2%

Source: https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/12340/watermelon-pie/

RECIPE 286: Cantaloupe Pie I
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 8
Yield: 1 to 9 - inch pie
Prep Time: 30 mins
Cook Time: 1 hrs
Total Time: 1 hrs 30 mins
Rating: 4.3/5
Category: /Desserts/Pies/Fruit Pies/

INGREDIENTS:
• 1 cantaloupe
• ½ cup white sugar
• 8 tablespoons all-purpose flour
• ¼ teaspoon salt
• 3 egg yolks
• 2 tablespoons water
• 1 tablespoon butter
• ¼ teaspoon butter flavored extract
• 3 egg whites
• ¼ teaspoon cream of tartar
• 6 tablespoons white sugar
• 1 (9 inch) pie crust
• baked

DIRECTIONS:
1. Select a cantaloupe of good quality
2. Cut in half, remove seeds, and scoop pulp into a saucepan
3. Place pulp over medium heat until it comes to a gentle boil
4. Mash the cantaloupe as it heats
5. This should make about 2 cups of pulp
6. Combine 1/2 cup sugar, flour, and salt
7. Add to heated cantaloupe and cook, stirring, until thick
8. The amount of flour seems large, but it takes considerable thickening to obtain correct consistency
9. In a large bowl, beat egg yolks; add water to yolks
10. Add a little of the cantaloupe mixture to egg yolks in order to heat yolks gradually
11. Stir egg yolks mixture into cantaloupe mixture
12. Continue cooking, stirring, until thick and creamy
13. Remove from heat
14. Add butter or margarine and flavoring to the cantaloupe mixture
15. Pour into baked pie shell
16. Beat egg whites and cream of tartar together until frothy
17. Continue beating, adding the 6 tablespoons sugar gradually; beat until thick peaks form
18. Top the pie with this meringue
19. Bake at 400 degrees F (205 degrees C) until delicately brown on top

NUTRITION INFO:
Total Fat 9g 11%, Saturated Fat 3g 16%, Cholesterol 81mg 27%, Sodium 220mg 10%, Total Carbohydrate 42g 15%, Dietary Fiber 1g 3%, Total Sugars 28g, Protein 4g, Vitamin C 25mg 127%, Calcium 20mg 2%, Iron 1mg 6%, Potassium 254mg 5%

Source: https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/12098/cantaloupe-pie-i/

============================================================

3. Toss to coat. bd.weld

RECIPE 288: Chilled Cantaloupe Soup
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 6
Yield: 6 servings
Prep Time: 20 mins
Total Time: 1 hrs 20 mins
Rating: 3.9/5
Category: /Soups, Stews and Chili Recipes/Soup Recipes/Fruit Soup Recipes/

INGREDIENTS:
• 1 cantaloupe - peeled
• seeded and cubed
• 2 cups orange juice
• 1 tablespoon fresh lime juice
• ¼ teaspoon ground cinnamon

DIRECTIONS:
1. Peel, seed, and cube the cantaloupe
2. Place cantaloupe and 1/2 cup orange juice in a blender or food processor; cover, and process until smooth
3. Transfer to large bowl
4. Stir in lime juice, cinnamon, and remaining orange juice
5. Cover, and refrigerate for at least one hour
6. Garnish with mint if desired

NUTRITION INFO:
Total Fat 0g 0%, Saturated Fat 0g 1%, Sodium 16mg 1%, Total Carbohydrate 16g 6%, Dietary Fiber 1g 4%, Total Sugars 14g, Protein 1g, Vitamin C 76mg 380%, Calcium 19mg 1%, Iron 0mg 2%, Potassium 414mg 9%

Source: https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/12912/chilled-cantaloupe-soup/

RECIPE 289: Watermelon and Blue Cheese Salad
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 12
Yield: 12 servings
Prep Time: 20 mins
Total Time: 20 mins
Rating: 4.8/5
Category: /Salad/Fruit Salad Recipes/

INGREDIENTS:
• ½ cup light olive oil
• ¼ cup white balsamic vinegar
• salt and ground black pepper to taste
• 5 pounds watermelon
• cut into bite-size cubes
• 1 small sweet onion (such as Vidalia®)
• thinly sliced
• 2 tablespoons chopped fresh mint
• or more to taste
• 6 ounces crumbled blue cheese

DIRECTIONS:
1. Whisk olive oil, vinegar, salt, and pepper together in a bowl until smooth
2. Mix watermelon, onion, and mint together in a separate bowl
3. Drizzle dressing over watermelon mixture and add blue cheese; toss well

NUTRITION INFO:
Total Fat 13g 17%, Saturated Fat 4g 20%, Cholesterol 11mg 4%, Sodium 201mg 9%, Total Carbohydrate 16g 6%, Dietary Fiber 1g 3%, Total Sugars 13g, Protein 4g, Vitamin C 16mg 80%, Calcium 92mg 7%, Iron 1mg 3%, Potassium 261mg 6%

RECIPE 290: Watermelon Fire and Ice Salsa
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 32
Yield: 4 cups
Prep Time: 15 mins
Total Time: 15 mins
Rating: 4.6/5
Category: /Appetizers and Snacks/Dips and Spreads Recipes/Salsa Recipes/Watermelon Salsa Recipes/

INGREDIENTS:
• 3 cups chopped watermelon
• ½ cup chopped green bell pepper
• 2 tablespoons lime juice
• 2 tablespoons chopped fresh cilantro
• 1 tablespoon chopped green onions
• 1 tablespoon chopped jalapeno pepper
• ½ teaspoon garlic salt

DIRECTIONS:
1. In a large bowl, combine the watermelon, green bell pepper, lime juice, cilantro, green onions, jalapeno and garlic salt
2. Mix well and serve

NUTRITION INFO:
Sodium 29mg 1%, Total Carbohydrate 1g 0%, Dietary Fiber 0g 0%, Total Sugars 1g, Protein 0g, Vitamin C 4mg 18%, Calcium 2mg 0%, Iron 0mg 1%, Potassium 23mg 0%

Source: https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/20846/watermelon-fire-and-ice-salsa/

RECIPE 291: Chef John's Watermelon Agua Fresca
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 6
Yield: 1 2-quart pitcher
Prep Time: 10 mins
Total Time: 50 mins
Rating: 4.5/5
Category: /Cuisine/Latin American/Mexican/

INGREDIENTS:
• ½ seedless watermelon
• 2 cups cold water
• ½ cup white sugar
• or to taste
• ½ cup water

DIRECTIONS:
1. Scoop flesh from watermelon half and transfer watermelon to a blender
2. Add 2 cups cold water
3. Place a folded towel on blender lid and blend until liquefied, about 1 minute
4. Strain through a fine mesh strainer into a large bowl to remove fibers
5. Discard fibers left in strainer
6. Skim and discard excess foam from juice if desired
7. Place sugar and 1/2 cup water into a saucepan over medium heat and stir until water is hot and sugar has dissolved
8. Turn off heat and let simple syrup cool to room temperature
9. Stir simple syrup into watermelon juice to taste
10. Pour drink into a 2-quart pitcher and refrigerate until cold, at least 30 minutes
11. To serve, fill tall glasses with ice cubes and pour agua fresca drink over ice
12. Serve with straws. "So refreshing!"

NUTRITION INFO:
Total Fat 1g 1%, Saturated Fat 0g 1%, Sodium 7mg 0%, Total Carbohydrate 45g 16%, Dietary Fiber 2g 5%, Total Sugars 40g, Protein 2g, Vitamin C 30mg 152%, Calcium 29mg 2%, Iron 1mg 5%, Potassium 421mg 9%

Source: https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/233795/chef-johns-watermelon-agua-fresca/

============================================================

RECIPE 292: Green Gazpacho
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 2
Prep Time: 25 mins
Total Time: 55 mins
Rating: 4.8/5
Category: /Soups, Stews and Chili Recipes/Soup Recipes/Vegetable Soup Recipes/Gazpacho Recipes/

INGREDIENTS:
• 2 cups diced honeydew melon
• 1 English (seedless) cucumber
• peeled and diced
• 1 small onion
• diced
• 1 avocado - peeled
• pitted
• and chopped
• 1 jalapeno pepper
• seeded and coarsely chopped
• 1 clove garlic
• chopped
• ¼ cup white balsamic vinegar
• 1 tablespoon lime juice
• salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste

DIRECTIONS:
1. Blend honeydew melon, cucumber, onion, avocado, jalapeño pepper, garlic, white balsamic vinegar, lime juice, salt, and black pepper in a blender until smooth
2. Adjust seasonings if desired and chill before serving

NUTRITION INFO:
Total Fat 15g 19%, Saturated Fat 2g 11%, Sodium 47mg 2%, Total Carbohydrate 36g 13%, Dietary Fiber 10g 37%, Total Sugars 22g, Protein 5g, Vitamin C 56mg 281%, Calcium 44mg 3%, Iron 1mg 7%, Potassium 980mg 21%

Source: https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/223507/green-gazpacho/

RECIPE 293: Mojito Fruit Salad
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 6
Yield: 6 servings
Prep Time: 20 mins
Total Time: 1 hrs 20 mins
Rating: 4.7/5
Category: /Salad/Fruit Salad Recipes/

INGREDIENTS:
• 1 cup cubed seeded watermelon
• 1 cup seedless grapes
• 1 cup cubed cantaloupe
• 1 cup hulled and quartered strawberries
• 1 cup peeled and quartered kiwi
• 1 cup fresh blueberries
• 3 sprigs fresh mint
• 2 teaspoons white sugar
• 3 tablespoons fresh lime juice

DIRECTIONS:
1. Mix the watermelon, grapes, cantaloupe, strawberries, and kiwi in a bowl with a tight-fitting lid; top with the blueberries
2. Stir the mint, sugar, and lime juice together in a bowl, crushing the mint with the back of a spoon while mixing to extract flavors; pour over the fruit mixture
3. Seal the bowl with lid and refrigerate at least 1 hour
4. Just before serving, gently flip the sealed bowl several times to coat the fruit with the dressing

NUTRITION INFO:
Total Fat 1g 1%, Saturated Fat 0g 1%, Sodium 7mg 0%, Total Carbohydrate 21g 8%, Dietary Fiber 3g 9%, Total Sugars 16g, Protein 1g, Vitamin C 63mg 313%, Calcium 27mg 2%, Iron 1mg 3%, Potassium 310mg 7%

Source: https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/215576/mojito-fruit-salad/

RECIPE 298: Perfect Summer Fruit Salad
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 10
Prep Time: 25 mins
Cook Time: 5 mins
Total Time: 3 hrs 30 mins
Rating: 4.6/5
Category: /Salad/Fruit Salad Recipes/

INGREDIENTS:
• ⅔ cup fresh orange juice
• ⅓ cup fresh lemon juice
• ⅓ cup packed brown sugar
• ½ teaspoon grated orange zest
• ½ teaspoon grated lemon zest
• 1 teaspoon vanilla extract

DIRECTIONS:
1. For the sauce: Bring orange juice, lemon juice, brown sugar, orange zest, and lemon zest to a boil in a saucepan over medium-high heat
2. Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer until slightly thickened, about 5 minutes
3. Remove from heat and stir in vanilla extract
4. Set aside to cool
5. For the salad: Layer fruit in a large, clear glass bowl in this order: pineapple, strawberries, kiwi fruit, bananas, oranges, grapes, and blueberries
6. Pour cooled sauce over fruit; cover and refrigerate for 3 to 4 hours before serving

NUTRITION INFO:
Total Fat 1g 1%, Saturated Fat 0g 1%, Sodium 5mg 0%, Total Carbohydrate 39g 14%, Dietary Fiber 5g 16%, Total Sugars 29g, Protein 2g, Vitamin C 94mg 471%, Calcium 45mg 3%, Iron 1mg 3%, Potassium 451mg 10%

Source: https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/214947/perfect-summer-fruit-salad/

------------------------------------------------------------

Prep Time: 10 mins
Cook Time: 5 mins
Total Time: 15 mins
Rating: 4.6/5

INGREDIENTS:
• ¾ cup fresh lemon juice

• cubed

• 1 tablespoon grated lemon zest

DIRECTIONS:
1. Combine lemon juice, sugar, butter, eggs, and lemon zest in a 2-quart saucepan

RECIPE 300: Tom Collins Cocktail
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 1
Prep Time: 5 mins
Total Time: 5 mins
Rating: 4.9/5
Category: /Drinks Recipes/Cocktail Recipes/Gin Drinks Recipes/

INGREDIENTS:
• 2 ½ cups ice
• divided
• 2 fluid ounces gin
• ¾ fluid ounce lemon juice
• ½ fluid ounce simple syrup
• 2 fluid ounces club soda
• 1 lemon wedge

DIRECTIONS:
1. Fill a Collins glass with 1 1/2 cups ice; set aside in the freezer
2. Combine gin, lemon juice, and simple syrup in a cocktail shaker
3. Add 1 cup ice, cover, and shake until chilled
4. Strain into the chilled Collins glass
5. Top with club soda and garnish with lemon wedge. lutzflcat

NUTRITION INFO:
Sodium 4mg 0%, Total Carbohydrate 13g 5%, Dietary Fiber 1g 3%, Total Sugars 1g, Protein 0g, Vitamin C 21mg 105%, Calcium 12mg 1%, Iron 0mg 1%, Potassium 49mg 1%

Source: https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/222511/tom-collins-cocktail/

RECIPE 301: Cornish Game Hens with Garlic and Rosemary
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 4
Yield: 4 hens
Prep Time: 20 mins
Cook Time: 1 hrs
Total Time: 1 hrs 20 mins
Rating: 4.5/5
Category: /Meat and Poultry/Chicken/Cornish Hen Recipes/

INGREDIENTS:
• 4 Cornish game hens
• 3 tablespoons olive oil
• divided
• salt and pepper to taste
• 1 lemon
• quartered
• 8 sprigs fresh rosemary
• divided
• 24 cloves garlic
• ⅓ cup white wine
• ⅓ cup low-sodium chicken broth

DIRECTIONS:
1. Preheat the oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C)
2. Rub hens with 1 tablespoon olive oil; lightly season with salt and pepper
3. Stuff 1 lemon quarter and 1 rosemary sprig into each cavity
4. Place hens in a large, heavy roasting pan and arrange garlic cloves around them
5. Roast in the preheated oven for 25 minutes
6. Meanwhile, whisk wine, chicken broth, and remaining 2 tablespoons olive oil together in a small bowl
7. Remove hens from the oven; reduce the oven temperature to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
8. Pour wine mixture over the hens and continue roasting, basting with pan juices every 10 minutes, until hens are golden brown and juices run clear, about 25 more minutes
9. An instant-read thermometer inserted near the bone should read 165 degrees F (74 degrees C)
10. Transfer hens to a platter, pouring any cavity juices into the roasting pan; discard lemons and rosemary
11. Tent hens with aluminum foil to keep warm
12. Transfer pan juices and garlic cloves to a medium saucepan; boil until reduced to a sauce consistency, about 6 minutes
13. Cut hens in half lengthwise and arrange two halves on each plate
14. Spoon sauce and roasted garlic on top
15. Garnish with remaining rosemary sprigs and serve. lc206

NUTRITION INFO:
Total Fat 58g 74%, Saturated Fat 15g 73%, Cholesterol 340mg 113%, Sodium 1383mg 60%, Total Carbohydrate 10g 4%, Dietary Fiber 2g 6%, Total Sugars 0g, Protein 59g, Vitamin C 28mg 142%, Calcium 93mg 7%, Iron 3mg 18%, Potassium 929mg 20%

Source: https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/8938/cornish-game-hens-with-garlic-and-rosemary/

============================================================

RECIPE 302: Easy Garlic-Lemon Scallops
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 6
Prep Time: 10 mins
Cook Time: 5 mins
Total Time: 15 mins
Rating: 4.6/5
Category: /Seafood/Shellfish/Scallops/

INGREDIENTS:
• ¾ cup butter
• 3 tablespoons minced garlic
• 2 pounds large sea scallops
• 2 tablespoons fresh lemon juice
• 1 teaspoon salt
• ⅛ teaspoon pepper

DIRECTIONS:
1. Melt butter in a large skillet over medium heat
2. Stir in garlic and cook for a few seconds until fragrant
3. Arrange scallops in a single layer in the skillet; cook until golden brown on one side, about 2 minutes
4. Turn scallops over using tongs and continue cooking until firm and opaque, about 2 minutes more
5. Transfer scallops to a platter, reserving butter in the skillet
6. Whisk lemon juice, salt, and pepper into butter; pour sauce over scallops to serve

NUTRITION INFO:
Total Fat 24g 31%, Saturated Fat 15g 73%, Cholesterol 152mg 51%, Sodium 988mg 43%, Total Carbohydrate 9g 3%, Dietary Fiber 0g 0%, Total Sugars 0g, Protein 39g, Vitamin C 4mg 18%, Calcium 72mg 6%, Iron 4mg 20%, Potassium 635mg 14%

Source: https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/132358/easy-garlic-lemon-scallops/

RECIPE 303: Greek-Style Lemon Roasted Potatoes
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 6
Prep Time: 15 mins
Cook Time: 1 hrs
Total Time: 1 hrs 15 mins
Rating: 4.7/5
Category: /Side Dish/Potato/Roasted Potato Recipes/

INGREDIENTS:
• 3 pounds potatoes
• peeled and cut into thick wedges
• ⅓ cup olive oil
• 2 lemons
• juiced
• 2 teaspoons salt
• 1 teaspoon oregano
• ½ teaspoon ground black pepper
• 3 cups chicken broth

DIRECTIONS:
1. Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
2. Put potato wedges in a large bowl
3. Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice and toss to coat
4. Season with salt, oregano, and black pepper; toss again to coat
5. Spread potato wedges in a single layer in a 2-inch-deep pan
6. Pour chicken broth over potatoes
7. Roast potatoes in the preheated oven until tender and golden brown, about 1 hour

NUTRITION INFO:
Total Fat 12g 16%, Saturated Fat 2g 9%, Sodium 789mg 34%, Total Carbohydrate 40g 15%, Dietary Fiber 5g 18%, Total Sugars 2g, Protein 5g, Vitamin C 45mg 225%, Calcium 33mg 3%, Iron 2mg 11%, Potassium 962mg 20%

Source: https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/239180/greek-style-lemon-roasted-potatoes/

------------------------------------------------------------

Total Time: 10 mins
Rating: 4.8/5

INGREDIENTS:
• 6 lemons
• 1 cup white sugar
• 6 cups water
• or more as needed

DIRECTIONS:
1. Juice lemons; you should have 1 cup juice
2. Combine juice, sugar, and water in a 1/2-gallon pitcher

RECIPE 305: Easy Lemon-Pepper Chicken Wings
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 4
Yield: 12 chicken wings
Prep Time: 10 mins
Cook Time: 10 mins
Total Time: 20 mins
Rating: 4.7/5
Category: /Meat and Poultry/Chicken/Wings/

INGREDIENTS:
• 2 cups oil
• or as needed
• 2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil
• 1 tablespoon lemon-pepper seasoning
• 12 chicken wings

DIRECTIONS:
1. Heat oil in a deep-fryer or large saucepan to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
2. Stir olive oil and lemon-pepper together in a bowl
3. Fry wings in hot oil until no longer pink at the bone and the juices run clear, about 8 minutes; an instant-read thermometer inserted near the bone should read 165 degrees F (74 degrees C)
4. Toss hot wings with lemon-pepper mixture to coat

NUTRITION INFO:
Total Fat 123g 158%, Saturated Fat 17g 85%, Cholesterol 58mg 19%, Sodium 409mg 18%, Total Carbohydrate 0g 0%, Dietary Fiber 0g 0%, Total Sugars 0g, Protein 21g, Calcium 12mg 1%, Iron 1mg 5%, Potassium 148mg 3%

RECIPE 306: Famous Chicken Française
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 6
Prep Time: 20 mins
Cook Time: 15 mins
Total Time: 35 mins
Rating: 4.3/5
Category: /Meat and Poultry/Chicken/Chicken Breast/Skillet Chicken/

INGREDIENTS:
• 1 large egg
• beaten
• 1 ½ medium lemons
• juiced
• divided
• 1 cup all-purpose flour
• 1 pinch garlic powder
• 1 pinch paprika
• 6 skinless
• boneless chicken breast halves
• 2 tablespoons butter
• 1 (14.5 ounce) can chicken broth
• 6 slices lemon
• for garnish
• 2 sprigs fresh parsley
• for garnish

DIRECTIONS:
1. Mix together egg and 1/3 of the lemon juice in a shallow dish or bowl
2. Mix together flour, garlic powder, and paprika in another shallow dish or bowl
3. Dip chicken breasts in egg mixture, then flour mixture to coat
4. Heat butter in a large skillet over medium heat
5. Add chicken breasts and cook until golden, 2 to 3 minutes per side
6. Mix together broth and remaining lemon juice in a medium bowl; pour over chicken in the skillet
7. Reduce heat to medium-low and let simmer until an instant-read thermometer inserted into the center reads at least 165 degrees F (74 degrees C), about 8 minutes
8. Place chicken on a serving platter
9. Cover with lemon sauce and garnish with fresh lemon slices and parsley sprigs

NUTRITION INFO:
Total Fat 7g 9%, Saturated Fat 3g 16%, Cholesterol 111mg 37%, Sodium 413mg 18%, Total Carbohydrate 21g 8%, Dietary Fiber 3g 10%, Total Sugars 1g, Protein 32g, Vitamin C 45mg 226%, Calcium 60mg 5%, Iron 3mg 16%, Potassium 452mg 10%

Source: https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/15181/famous-chicken-francaise/

============================================================

RECIPE 308: The Best Lemon Vinaigrette
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 8
Yield: 1 cup
Prep Time: 10 mins
Total Time: 10 mins
Rating: 4.7/5
Category: /Side Dish/Sauces and Condiments/Salad Dressing Recipes/Vinaigrette Dressing Recipes/

INGREDIENTS:
• ¼ cup red wine vinegar
• 2 tablespoons Dijon mustard
• 1 clove garlic
• minced
• 1 teaspoon dried oregano
• ½ teaspoon kosher salt
• ¼ teaspoon ground black pepper
• ½ cup olive oil
• 2 tablespoons fresh lemon juice

DIRECTIONS:
1. Whisk red wine vinegar, Dijon mustard, garlic, oregano, salt, and pepper together in a small bowl
2. Slowly stream olive oil into vinegar mixture, whisking continuously, until well combined
3. Add lemon juice and whisk to combine
4. Pour vinaigrette into a screw-top jar or bottle; seal
5. Shake before serving

NUTRITION INFO:
Total Fat 14g 17%, Saturated Fat 2g 10%, Sodium 214mg 9%, Total Carbohydrate 2g 1%, Dietary Fiber 0g 0%, Total Sugars 0g, Protein 0g, Vitamin C 2mg 10%, Calcium 4mg 0%, Iron 0mg 1%, Potassium 18mg 0%

Source: https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/236780/the-best-lemon-vinaigrette/

============================================================

RECIPE 309: Frog Eye Salad
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 10
Prep Time: 15 mins
Cook Time: 20 mins
Total Time: 9 hrs 35 mins
Rating: 4.6/5
Category: /Salad/Pasta Salad/Fruit Pasta Salad Recipes/

INGREDIENTS:
• 1 ¾ cups unsweetened pineapple juice
• 1 cup white sugar
• 2 eggs
• beaten
• 2 tablespoons all-purpose flour
• 2 ½ teaspoons salt
• divided
• 1 tablespoon lemon juice
• 1 tablespoon vegetable oil
• 1 (16 ounce) package acini di pepe pasta
• 3 (11 ounce) cans mandarin oranges
• drained
• 2 (20 ounce) cans pineapple tidbits
• drained
• 1 (20 ounce) can crushed pineapple
• drained
• 1 (8 ounce) container frozen whipped topping
• thawed
• 1 cup miniature marshmallows
• 1 cup shredded coconut

DIRECTIONS:
1. Combine pineapple juice, sugar, eggs, flour, and 1/2 teaspoon salt in a saucepan
2. Stir and cook over medium heat until thickened
3. Remove from heat; stir in lemon juice
4. Let cool to room temperature, about 1 hour
5. Bring a large pot of water to a boil; add oil and remaining 2 teaspoons salt
6. Add pasta and cook until al dente, 5 to 7 minutes
7. Drain and rinse under cold water
8. Combine cooked pasta, cooled egg mixture, mandarin oranges, pineapple tidbits, crushed pineapple, and whipped topping in a large bowl; mix well
9. Refrigerate until chilled, 8 hours to overnight
10. Before serving, add marshmallows and coconut; toss and serve

NUTRITION INFO:
Total Fat 11g 14%, Saturated Fat 7g 37%, Cholesterol 37mg 12%, Sodium 648mg 28%, Total Carbohydrate 114g 41%, Dietary Fiber 4g 14%, Total Sugars 75g, Protein 9g, Vitamin C 30mg 150%, Calcium 55mg 4%, Iron 3mg 18%, Potassium 388mg 8%

Source: https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/14439/frog-eye-salad/

============================================================

RECIPE 310: Air Fryer Lobster Tails with Lemon-Garlic Butter
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 2
Yield: 2 lobster tails
Prep Time: 10 mins
Cook Time: 10 mins
Total Time: 20 mins
Rating: 4.7/5
Category: /Seafood/Shellfish/Lobster/

INGREDIENTS:
• 2 (4 ounce) lobster tails
• 4 tablespoons butter
• 1 teaspoon lemon zest
• 1 clove garlic
• grated
• salt and ground black pepper to taste
• 1 teaspoon chopped fresh parsley
• 2 wedges lemon

DIRECTIONS:
1. Preheat an air fryer to 380 degrees F (195 degrees C)
2. Butterfly lobster tails by cutting lengthwise through the centers of the hard top shells and meat with kitchen shears
3. Cut to, but not through, the bottoms of the shells
4. Spread tail halves apart
5. Place tails in the air fryer basket with lobster meat facing up
6. Melt butter in a small saucepan over medium heat
7. Add lemon zest and garlic; heat until garlic is fragrant, about 30 seconds
8. Transfer 2 tablespoons of butter mixture to a small bowl and brush onto lobster tails; discard any remaining brushed butter to avoid contamination from uncooked lobster
9. Season lobster with salt and pepper
10. Cook in the preheated air fryer until lobster meat is opaque, 5 to 7 minutes
11. Spoon reserved butter from the saucepan over lobster meat
12. Top with parsley and serve with lemon wedges

NUTRITION INFO:
Total Fat 26g 33%, Saturated Fat 16g 80%, Cholesterol 129mg 43%, Sodium 590mg 26%, Total Carbohydrate 3g 1%, Dietary Fiber 1g 3%, Total Sugars 0g, Protein 18g, Vitamin C 13mg 65%, Calcium 73mg 6%, Iron 1mg 3%, Potassium 340mg 7%

Source: https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/276006/air-fryer-lobster-tails-with-lemon-garlic-butter/

============================================================

RECIPE 311: Baked Fish Fillets
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 6
Prep Time: 10 mins
Cook Time: 20 mins
Total Time: 30 mins
Rating: 4.7/5
Category: /Seafood/Fish/

INGREDIENTS:
• 1 tablespoon vegetable oil
• or to taste
• 2 pounds mackerel fillets
• 1 teaspoon salt
• ⅛ teaspoon ground black pepper
• ¼ cup butter
• melted
• 2 tablespoons lemon juice
• ⅛ teaspoon ground paprika

DIRECTIONS:
1. Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
2. Grease a baking pan with vegetable oil
3. Place mackerel fillets in the baking pan; season with salt and pepper
4. Mix butter, lemon juice, and paprika together in a bowl
5. Pour over mackerel fillets
6. Bake in the preheated oven until fish flakes easily with a fork, 20 to 25 minutes

NUTRITION INFO:
Total Fat 31g 40%, Saturated Fat 10g 51%, Cholesterol 109mg 36%, Sodium 540mg 23%, Total Carbohydrate 1g 0%, Total Sugars 0g, Protein 28g, Vitamin C 3mg 14%, Calcium 21mg 2%, Iron 2mg 11%, Potassium 484mg 10%

Source: https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/256349/baked-fish-fillets/

RECIPE 312: Vietnamese Grilled Lemongrass Chicken
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 4
Prep Time: 10 mins
Cook Time: 10 mins
Total Time: 40 mins
Rating: 4.6/5
Category: /BBQ & Grilling/Chicken/

INGREDIENTS:
• 2 tablespoons canola oil
• 2 tablespoons finely chopped lemongrass
• 1 tablespoon lemon juice
• 2 teaspoons soy sauce
• 2 teaspoons light brown sugar
• 2 teaspoons minced garlic
• 1 teaspoon fish sauce
• 1 ½ pounds chicken thighs
• or more to taste
• pounded to an even thickness

DIRECTIONS:
1. Mix together canola oil, lemongrass, lemon juice, soy sauce, brown sugar, garlic, and fish sauce in a glass bowl until sugar is dissolved; add chicken and turn to coat in marinade
2. Marinate chicken in the refrigerator for 20 minutes to 1 hour
3. Preheat grill for medium heat and lightly oil the grate
4. Remove chicken thighs from marinade; shake to remove excess
5. Discard remaining marinade
6. Cook chicken on the preheated grill until no longer pink in the center and juices run clear, 3 to 5 minutes per side
7. An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 165 degrees F (74 degrees C)

NUTRITION INFO:
Total Fat 19g 24%, Saturated Fat 4g 19%, Cholesterol 105mg 35%, Sodium 339mg 15%, Total Carbohydrate 4g 1%, Dietary Fiber 0g 0%, Total Sugars 2g, Protein 29g, Vitamin C 2mg 11%, Calcium 21mg 2%, Iron 2mg 9%, Potassium 303mg 6%

Source: https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/241607/vietnamese-grilled-lemongrass-chicken/

============================================================

RECIPE 313: Orange Crush! Fresh Squeezed Orange and Vodka Cocktail

Servings: 1
Yield: 1 cocktail

RECIPE 314: The Ultimate Berry Crumble
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 8
Yield: 1 2-quart baking dish
Prep Time: 15 mins
Cook Time: 40 mins
Total Time: 1 hrs 25 mins
Rating: 4.8/5
Category: /Desserts/Fruit Desserts/Raspberry Dessert Recipes/

INGREDIENTS:
• 2 cups all-purpose flour
• ¾ cup white sugar
• ¾ teaspoon baking powder
• ¼ teaspoon fine salt
• ¾ cup frozen unsalted butter
• 2 large egg yolks
• 1 ½ teaspoons vanilla extract
• 1 teaspoon apple cider vinegar
• or as needed

DIRECTIONS:
1. Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
2. Make crumble: Combine flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt in a large bowl
3. Whisk until thoroughly combined
4. Grate in frozen butter, stopping occasionally to toss butter into flour mixture until coated
5. Stir in egg yolks and vanilla with a fork until egg is mostly absorbed
6. Add 1 teaspoon vinegar; mix briefly
7. Use your hands to finish mixing, squeezing until clumps form, but mixture remains mostly dry
8. Add more vinegar if needed
9. Set crumble aside
10. Make filling: Combine blueberries, raspberries, and blackberries in another large bowl
11. Add sugar, cornstarch, lemon juice, lemon zest, and cayenne pepper
12. Mix until well combined and sugar and cornstarch are mostly dissolved
13. Place about 1/2 of the crumble mixture into the bottom of a 2-quart baking dish
14. Press mixture down using a flat cup until well compacted
15. Spread berry filling on top
16. Sprinkle remaining crumble mixture over berries, squeezing some of the crumble into clumps
17. Bake in the preheated oven until top is beautifully browned and berry filling bubbles, 40 to 45 minutes
18. Let cool to room temperature before serving, about 30 minutes

NUTRITION INFO:
Total Fat 19g 24%, Saturated Fat 11g 57%, Cholesterol 97mg 32%, Sodium 124mg 5%, Total Carbohydrate 58g 21%, Dietary Fiber 3g 12%, Total Sugars 31g, Protein 5g, Vitamin C 10mg 52%, Calcium 51mg 4%, Iron 2mg 11%, Potassium 114mg 2%

Source: https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/264590/the-ultimate-berry-crumble/

============================================================

RECIPE 315: Mandarin Orange Cake
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 18
Yield: 1 9x13-inch cake
Prep Time: 20 mins
Cook Time: 1 hrs
Total Time: 1 hrs 50 mins
Rating: 4.6/5
Category: /Desserts/Fruit Desserts/Orange Dessert Recipes/

INGREDIENTS:
• 1 (15.25 ounce) package yellow cake mix
• 1 (11 ounce) can mandarin orange segments
• 4 large eggs
• 1 cup vegetable oil
• 1 (20 ounce) can crushed pineapple with juice
• 1 (8 ounce) container frozen whipped topping
• thawed
• 1 (3.5 ounce) package instant vanilla pudding mix

DIRECTIONS:
1. Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
2. Grease and flour a 9x13-inch baking pan
3. Combine cake mix, mandarin oranges with juice, eggs, and oil in a large bowl; beat with an electric mixer until smooth
4. Pour batter into the prepared pan
5. Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean, about 35 to 40 minutes
6. Set aside to cool for at least 30 minutes
7. Beat pineapple with juice, whipped topping, and dry pudding mix together in a large bowl until blended
8. Spread on cooled cake

NUTRITION INFO:
Total Fat 20g 26%, Saturated Fat 5g 26%, Cholesterol 42mg 14%, Sodium 287mg 12%, Total Carbohydrate 38g 14%, Dietary Fiber 1g 3%, Total Sugars 27g, Protein 3g, Vitamin C 6mg 32%, Calcium 52mg 4%, Iron 1mg 4%, Potassium 93mg 2%

Source: https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/8101/mandarin-orange-cake-i/

RECIPE 316: Warm Lemon, Honey, and Ginger Soother
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 4
Yield: 4 cups
Prep Time: 5 mins
Total Time: 10 mins
Rating: 5.0/5
Category: /Drinks Recipes/Tea/Hot/

INGREDIENTS:
• ¼ cup honey
• or to taste
• 1 lemon
• juiced
• 1 tablespoon finely grated ginger root
• ¼ teaspoon ground cinnamon
• 3 ½ cups boiling water

DIRECTIONS:
1. Place honey, lemon juice, ginger, and cinnamon in a teapot or 4-cup glass measuring beaker with spout
2. Pour boiling water over mixture; stir until honey is dissolved
3. Cover the teapot and let steep for 5 minutes
4. The ginger should sink to the bottom but may be strained while pouring into a mug

NUTRITION INFO:
Total Fat 0g 0%, Sodium 8mg 0%, Total Carbohydrate 21g 8%, Dietary Fiber 2g 5%, Total Sugars 17g, Protein 0g, Vitamin C 22mg 109%, Calcium 26mg 2%, Iron 0mg 2%, Potassium 60mg 1%

RECIPE 317: Candied Lemon Peel
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 15
Prep Time: 10 mins
Cook Time: 1 hrs
Total Time: 1 hrs 40 mins
Rating: 4.5/5
Category: /Desserts/Fruit Desserts/Lemon Dessert Recipes/

INGREDIENTS:
• 3 lemons
• 8 cups cold water
• or as needed
• 2 cups white sugar
• or as needed

DIRECTIONS:
1. Cut lemons into slices about 1/4-inch thick and remove the fruit pulp
2. Cut the rings in half so the peels are in long strips
3. Bring water and lemon peels to a boil in a small pan
4. Drain water, and repeat with fresh cold water
5. Repeat the boiling step three times (see Editor's Note)
6. Drain and set peels aside
7. Combine 2 cups fresh water with 2 cups sugar
8. Bring to a boil, stirring to dissolve the sugar
9. Reduce heat to low and stir in citrus peels; simmer until the white pith is translucent
10. Store peels in syrup, refrigerated, to keep them soft, or allow them to dry
11. Toss dry candied peels in additional sugar and store in an airtight container at room temperature

NUTRITION INFO:
Total Fat 0g 0%, Sodium 4mg 0%, Total Carbohydrate 29g 11%, Dietary Fiber 1g 4%, Total Sugars 27g, Protein 0g, Vitamin C 17mg 83%, Calcium 17mg 1%, Iron 0mg 1%, Potassium 33mg 1%

Source: https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/56693/candied-lemon-peel/

============================================================

RECIPE 318: Baked Salmon in Foil
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 6
Prep Time: 20 mins
Cook Time: 20 mins
Total Time: 40 mins
Rating: 4.5/5
Category: /Main Dishes/Seafood Main Dishes/Salmon/Baked Salmon Recipes/

INGREDIENTS:
• ½ cup olive oil
• 5 cloves cloves garlic
• minced or pressed through a garlic press
• 2 ½ tablespoons fresh lemon juice
• or more to taste
• 1 tablespoon brown sugar
• 1 teaspoon dried oregano
• 1 teaspoon dried thyme
• salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
• aluminum foil
• 1 teaspoon olive oil
• 1 (3 pound) salmon fillet
• ¼ cup chopped fresh parsley
• 1 lemon
• sliced

DIRECTIONS:
1. Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
2. Combine 1/2 cup olive oil, garlic, lemon juice, brown sugar, oregano, thyme, salt, and pepper in a bowl
3. Place a large piece of aluminum foil on a baking sheet and brush with 1 teaspoon olive oil
4. Place salmon, skin-side down, in the middle of the foil
5. Drizzle with olive oil mixture
6. Fold up the edges of the foil over salmon to create a packet, making sure to seal the edges
7. Bake in the preheated oven until fish flakes easily with a fork, 20 to 25 minutes
8. Garnish with fresh parsley and lemon slices

NUTRITION INFO:
Total Fat 26g 34%, Saturated Fat 5g 23%, Cholesterol 96mg 32%, Sodium 131mg 6%, Total Carbohydrate 6g 2%, Dietary Fiber 1g 4%, Total Sugars 2g, Protein 42g, Vitamin C 24mg 121%, Calcium 109mg 8%, Iron 2mg 11%, Potassium 827mg 18%

Source: https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/263217/baked-salmon-in-foil/

RECIPE 319: Cranberry Orange Bread
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 8
Yield: 1 loaf
Prep Time: 15 mins
Cook Time: 1 hrs
Total Time: 1 hrs 25 mins
Rating: 4.6/5
Category: /Bread/Quick Bread Recipes/Fruit Bread Recipes/Cranberry Bread Recipes/

INGREDIENTS:
• 2 cups flour
• ¾ cup white sugar
• 1 ½ teaspoons baking powder
• ¾ teaspoon salt
• ½ teaspoon baking soda
• ¼ cup unsalted butter
• cut into pieces and softened
• ¾ cup orange juice
• 1 tablespoon grated orange zest
• 1 large egg
• beaten
• 1 cup chopped cranberries
• ½ cup chopped walnuts (Optional)

DIRECTIONS:
1. Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
2. Grease an 8 1/2x4 1/2-inch loaf pan
3. Combine flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, and baking soda in a bowl
4. Stir butter into flour mixture until combined
5. Add orange juice, orange zest, and egg; mix well
6. Fold in cranberries and walnuts
7. Spoon batter into the prepared pan
8. Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean, 60 to 75 minutes
9. Cool in the pan for 10 minutes before removing to cool completely on a wire rack

NUTRITION INFO:
Total Fat 12g 15%, Saturated Fat 4g 22%, Cholesterol 39mg 13%, Sodium 439mg 19%, Total Carbohydrate 48g 18%, Dietary Fiber 2g 8%, Total Sugars 22g, Protein 5g, Vitamin C 15mg 73%, Calcium 73mg 6%, Iron 2mg 11%, Potassium 136mg 3%

Source: https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/228118/cranberry-orange-bread/

RECIPE 320: Raspberry Jam without Pectin
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 56
Yield: 7 8-ounce jars
Prep Time: 5 mins
Cook Time: 20 mins
Total Time: 8 hrs 30 mins
Rating: 4.6/5
Category: /Side Dish/Sauces and Condiments/Canning and Preserving Recipes/Jams and Jellies Recipes/

INGREDIENTS:
• 4 cups mashed raspberries
• 4 cups white sugar
• 1 tablespoon freshly squeezed lemon juice

DIRECTIONS:
1. Bring raspberries to a boil in a very large pot
2. Cook for 4 minutes
3. Add sugar and lemon juice; stir well
4. Bring back to a boil, stirring constantly
5. Cook for another 4 minutes
6. Remove pot from heat and divide jam into sterilized jars, leaving 1/4-inch of space at the top
7. Seal and transfer jars into a boiling water bath
8. Make sure jars are covered with at least 1 inch of water; let sit for 5 minutes
9. Lift jars and let them cool in a draft-free place without touching, 8 hours to overnight

NUTRITION INFO:
Total Carbohydrate 15g 6%, Dietary Fiber 1g 2%, Total Sugars 15g, Protein 0g, Vitamin C 2mg 12%, Calcium 2mg 0%, Iron 0mg 1%, Potassium 14mg 0%

Source: https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/263781/raspberry-jam-without-pectin/

RECIPE 322: Lemon Chicken Orzo Soup
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 12
Yield: 6 quarts
Prep Time: 20 mins
Cook Time: 1 hrs
Total Time: 1 hrs 20 mins
Rating: 4.8/5
Category: /Soups, Stews and Chili Recipes/Soup Recipes/Noodle Soup Recipes/

INGREDIENTS:
• 8 ounces orzo pasta
• 1 teaspoon olive oil
• 3 medium carrots
• chopped
• or more to taste
• 3 ribs celery
• chopped
• 1 medium onion
• chopped
• 2 cloves garlic
• minced
• ½ teaspoon dried thyme
• ½ teaspoon dried oregano
• salt and ground black pepper to taste
• 1 bay leaf
• 3 (32 ounce) cartons fat-free
• low-sodium chicken broth
• ½ cup fresh lemon juice
• 1 lemon
• zested
• 8 ounces cooked chicken breast
• chopped
• 1 (8 ounce) package baby spinach leaves
• 1 lemon
• sliced for garnish (Optional)
• ¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese (Optional)

DIRECTIONS:
1. Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
2. Stir in orzo and return to a boil
3. Cook pasta uncovered until partially cooked through but not yet soft, about 5 minutes; drain and rinse with cold water until cooled completely
4. Heat olive oil in a large pot over medium heat
5. Add carrots, celery, and onion; cook and stir until vegetables begin to soften and onion becomes translucent, 5 to 7 minutes
6. Add garlic; cook and stir until fragrant, about 1 minute more
7. Season mixture with thyme, oregano, bay leaf, salt, and black pepper; continue cooking another 30 seconds before pouring chicken broth into the pot
8. Bring broth to a boil
9. Partially cover the pot, reduce heat to medium-low, and simmer until vegetables are just tender, about 10 minutes
10. Stir orzo, lemon juice, and lemon zest into broth; add chicken
11. Cook until chicken and orzo are heated through, about 5 minutes
12. Add baby spinach; cook until spinach wilts into broth and orzo is tender, 2 to 3 minutes
13. Ladle soup into bowls; garnish with lemon slices and Parmesan cheese

NUTRITION INFO:
Total Fat 4g 5%, Saturated Fat 2g 8%, Cholesterol 20mg 7%, Sodium 187mg 8%, Total Carbohydrate 22g 8%, Dietary Fiber 3g 9%, Total Sugars 4g, Protein 12g, Vitamin C 20mg 102%, Calcium 69mg 5%, Iron 2mg 9%, Potassium 321mg 7%

Source: https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/233968/lemon-chicken-orzo-soup/

============================================================

RECIPE 323: Simple Lemon Cake
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 10
Yield: 1 9-inch square cake
Prep Time: 10 mins
Cook Time: 35 mins
Total Time: 45 mins
Rating: 4.4/5
Category: /Desserts/Fruit Desserts/Lemon Dessert Recipes/

INGREDIENTS:
• 1 cup white sugar
• ½ cup butter
• 2 large eggs
• 2 teaspoons vanilla extract
• 1 ½ cups all-purpose flour
• 1 ¾ teaspoons baking powder
• ¾ cup milk
• 1 tablespoon lemon zest
• 1 tablespoon lemon juice

DIRECTIONS:
1. Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
2. Grease a 9-inch square baking pan
3. Beat sugar and butter together in a mixing bowl using an electric mixer until light and fluffy
4. Beat in eggs and vanilla extract until well combined
5. Sift flour and baking powder together in a separate bowl; add to creamed mixture until incorporated
6. Pour in milk, lemon zest, and lemon juice; mix until smooth
7. Spoon batter into the prepared pan
8. Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean, about 35 minutes

NUTRITION INFO:
Total Fat 11g 14%, Saturated Fat 6g 32%, Cholesterol 63mg 21%, Sodium 173mg 8%, Total Carbohydrate 36g 13%, Dietary Fiber 1g 2%, Total Sugars 21g, Protein 4g, Vitamin C 2mg 8%, Calcium 81mg 6%, Iron 1mg 7%, Potassium 68mg 1%

Source: https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/273698/simple-lemon-cake/

============================================================

RECIPE 324: Greek Lemon Chicken Soup
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 16
Prep Time: 25 mins
Cook Time: 40 mins
Total Time: 1 hrs 5 mins
Rating: 4.5/5
Category: /Soups, Stews and Chili Recipes/Soup Recipes/Chicken Soup Recipes/Chicken and Rice Soup Recipes/

INGREDIENTS:
• 8 cups chicken broth
• ½ cup fresh lemon juice
• ½ cup shredded carrots
• ½ cup chopped onion
• ½ cup chopped celery
• 6 tablespoons chicken soup base
• ¼ teaspoon ground white pepper
• ¼ cup margarine
• ¼ cup all-purpose flour
• 8 egg yolks
• 1 cup cooked white rice
• 1 cup diced
• cooked chicken meat
• 16 slices lemon

DIRECTIONS:
1. Combine chicken broth, lemon juice, carrots, onions, celery, soup base, and white pepper in a large pot
2. Bring to a boil over high heat, then reduce heat and simmer for 20 minutes
3. Blend margarine and flour in a small bowl; gradually stir into soup mixture
4. Simmer, stirring frequently, for 10 minutes
5. Meanwhile, beat egg yolks in a bowl until light in color
6. Gradually whisk in some hot soup
7. Add egg mixture to the pot and heat through
8. Add rice and chicken; cook until warmed through
9. Ladle hot soup into bowls and garnish with lemon slices

NUTRITION INFO:
Total Fat 7g 8%, Saturated Fat 2g 9%, Cholesterol 110mg 37%, Sodium 1237mg 54%, Total Carbohydrate 9g 3%, Dietary Fiber 1g 4%, Total Sugars 2g, Protein 8g, Vitamin C 15mg 73%, Calcium 34mg 3%, Iron 1mg 6%, Potassium 197mg 4%

Source: https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/12963/greek-lemon-chicken-soup/

============================================================

RECIPE 325: Lemon Cookies from Scratch
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 20
Yield: 20 cookies
Prep Time: 15 mins
Cook Time: 15 mins
Total Time: 1 hrs
Rating: 4.3/5
Category: /Desserts/Fruit Desserts/Lemon Dessert Recipes/

INGREDIENTS:
• 1 cup white sugar
• ½ cup butter
• softened
• 2 tablespoons fresh lemon zest
• 2 eggs
• 1 tablespoon fresh lemon juice
• ½ teaspoon vanilla extract
• 1 ¾ cups all-purpose flour
• 1 ½ teaspoons baking powder
• ¼ teaspoon salt
• ¼ cup powdered sugar

DIRECTIONS:
1. Cream sugar, butter, and lemon zest together in a large bowl using an electric mixer until light and fluffy, about 3 minutes
2. Combine eggs, lemon juice, and vanilla extract in a cup; mix using a fork until combined
3. Beat into egg mixture slowly on low speed
4. Whisk flour, baking powder, and salt together in a medium bowl
5. Add to egg mixture slowly on low speed until just combined
6. Do not overbeat; dough will be sticky
7. Cover and chill dough in the refrigerator for 30 minutes; it will still be sticky after chilling
8. Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
9. Line 2 large baking sheets with parchment paper
10. Form dough into balls using a cookie scoop or tablespoon and roll each in powdered sugar
11. Place onto the prepared baking sheets, spacing 2 inches apart
12. Lightly smash each ball down using your hand
13. Bake in the preheated oven until the middle of each cookie is just barely set, 11 to 12 minutes
14. Let cool on a wire rack completely before storing in an airtight container

NUTRITION INFO:
Total Fat 5g 7%, Saturated Fat 3g 16%, Cholesterol 31mg 10%, Sodium 106mg 5%, Total Carbohydrate 20g 7%, Dietary Fiber 0g 1%, Total Sugars 12g, Protein 2g, Vitamin C 1mg 4%, Calcium 27mg 2%, Iron 1mg 3%, Potassium 21mg 0%

Source: https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/276680/lemon-cookies-from-scratch/

============================================================

RECIPE 326: Orange Gelatin Salad
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 7
Prep Time: 10 mins
Total Time: 40 mins
Rating: 4.7/5
Category: /Desserts/Specialty Dessert Recipes/Dessert Salad Recipes/Jell-O® Salad/

INGREDIENTS:
• 1 (11 ounce) can mandarin oranges
• drained
• 1 (8 ounce) can crushed pineapple
• drained
• 1 (6 ounce) package orange flavored Jell-O® mix
• 16 ounces cottage cheese
• 8 ounces frozen whipped topping
• thawed

DIRECTIONS:
1. Combine oranges, pineapple, and gelatin mix in a mixing bowl
2. Mix well and chill for 30 minutes
3. Add cottage cheese to the fruit mixture; stir to combine
4. Gently fold in whipped topping; chill and serve

NUTRITION INFO:
Total Fat 8g 11%, Saturated Fat 7g 36%, Cholesterol 10mg 3%, Sodium 350mg 15%, Total Carbohydrate 41g 15%, Dietary Fiber 1g 2%, Total Sugars 35g, Protein 10g, Vitamin C 7mg 36%, Calcium 43mg 3%, Iron 0mg 2%, Potassium 93mg 2%

RECIPE 327: Quick and Easy Chicken
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 4
Prep Time: 15 mins
Cook Time: 30 mins
Total Time: 45 mins
Rating: 4.4/5
Category: /Meat and Poultry/Chicken/Chicken Breast/Skillet Chicken/

INGREDIENTS:
• 2 tablespoons olive oil
• 1 onion
• chopped
• 4 skinless
• boneless chicken breast halves
• 3 tablespoons ketchup
• 3 tablespoons white sugar
• 2 tablespoons soy sauce
• 2 tablespoons lemon juice
• 1 teaspoon ground black pepper

DIRECTIONS:
1. Warm oil in a large skillet over medium heat
2. Sauté onion in oil until translucent, 3 to 4 minutes
3. Add chicken to onion in the skillet; cook until chicken is lightly browned, 1 to 2 minutes per side
4. Combine ketchup, sugar, soy sauce, lemon juice, and pepper in a bowl; mix well
5. Pour over chicken; bring to a boil, then reduce heat
6. Cover and simmer until chicken is no longer pink in the center and the juices run clear, 25 to 35 minutes
7. An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 165 degrees F (74 degrees C)

NUTRITION INFO:
Total Fat 8g 11%, Saturated Fat 1g 7%, Cholesterol 68mg 23%, Sodium 655mg 28%, Total Carbohydrate 16g 6%, Dietary Fiber 1g 3%, Total Sugars 13g, Protein 28g, Vitamin C 9mg 44%, Calcium 26mg 2%, Iron 1mg 7%, Potassium 418mg 9%

Source: https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/8545/quick-and-easy-chicken/

============================================================

RECIPE 328: Parchment Baked Salmon
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 2
Prep Time: 15 mins
Cook Time: 25 mins
Total Time: 40 mins
Rating: 4.5/5
Category: /Main Dishes/Seafood Main Dishes/Salmon/Baked Salmon Recipes/

INGREDIENTS:
• 1 (8 ounce) salmon fillet
• salt and ground black pepper to taste
• ¼ cup chopped basil leaves
• olive oil cooking spray
• 1 lemon
• thinly sliced

DIRECTIONS:
1. Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
2. Move an oven rack to the lowest position
3. Place salmon fillet, skin-side down, in the middle of a large piece of parchment paper; season with salt and black pepper
4. Cut two 3-inch slits into fillet with a sharp knife
5. Stuff chopped basil leaves into the slits
6. Spray fillet with cooking spray and arrange lemon slices on top
7. Fold the edges of parchment paper over fillet several times to seal it into an airtight packet
8. Place sealed packet onto a baking sheet
9. Bake in the preheated oven on the bottom rack until salmon flakes easily and flesh is pink and opaque with an interior of slightly darker pink color, about 25 minutes
10. An instant-read thermometer inserted into the thickest part of fillet should read at least 145 degrees F (65 degrees C)
11. To serve, cut open the parchment paper and remove lemon slices before plating

NUTRITION INFO:
Total Fat 7g 9%, Saturated Fat 1g 7%, Cholesterol 50mg 17%, Sodium 48mg 2%, Total Carbohydrate 6g 2%, Dietary Fiber 3g 10%, Protein 25g, Vitamin C 45mg 225%, Calcium 84mg 6%, Iron 1mg 7%, Potassium 495mg 11%

Source: https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/229032/parchment-baked-salmon/

============================================================

RECIPE 329: Pan-Fried Shrimp
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 4
Yield: 1 pound shrimp
Prep Time: 5 mins
Cook Time: 5 mins
Total Time: 10 mins
Rating: 4.5/5
Category: /Seafood/Shellfish/Shrimp/

INGREDIENTS:
• 8 tablespoons butter
• divided
• 1 pound peeled and deveined bay shrimp
• 1 tablespoon lemon juice
• divided
• 1 pinch garlic salt
• or to taste
• salt and ground black pepper to taste

DIRECTIONS:
1. Melt 6 tablespoons butter in a large skillet over high heat
2. Add shrimp; cook and stir in hot butter until browned, about 2 minutes
3. Reduce heat to medium-low
4. Stir in 1 1/2 teaspoons lemon juice, garlic salt, salt, and pepper; cook until heated through, about 1 minute
5. Remove from heat; stir in remaining 2 tablespoons butter and 1 1/2 teaspoons lemon juice

NUTRITION INFO:
Total Fat 24g 31%, Saturated Fat 15g 74%, Cholesterol 234mg 78%, Sodium 483mg 21%, Total Carbohydrate 0g 0%, Total Sugars 0g, Protein 19g, Vitamin C 4mg 19%, Calcium 42mg 3%, Iron 3mg 15%, Potassium 173mg 4%

Source: https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/258426/pan-fried-shrimp/

============================================================

RECIPE 330: Chicken with Lemon-Caper Sauce
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 2
Prep Time: 10 mins
Cook Time: 20 mins
Total Time: 30 mins
Rating: 4.6/5
Category: /Meat and Poultry/Chicken/Chicken Breast/

INGREDIENTS:
• ½ cup all-purpose flour
• 1 pinch salt
• 2 (6 ounce) skinless
• boneless chicken breast halves
• 2 tablespoons olive oil
• ¼ cup dry white wine
• ¼ cup lemon juice
• ¼ cup cold unsalted butter
• cut into pieces
• 2 tablespoons capers
• drained
• 2 lemon wedges

DIRECTIONS:
1. Mix together flour and salt in a medium dish or resealable plastic bag
2. Coat chicken in flour mixture; shake off excess
3. Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium-high heat
4. Cook chicken in hot oil until golden brown and cooked through, 3 to 4 minutes per side
5. An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 165 degrees F (74 degrees C)
6. Transfer chicken to a plate; cover and keep warm
7. Pour white wine into the skillet; allow to boil while scraping the cooked bits from the bottom of the pan
8. Add lemon juice; boil until reduced by half, 2 to 3 minutes
9. Sprinkle cubed butter into boiling sauce
10. Swirl and shake the pan vigorously until butter is completely incorporated and sauce thickens. (Butter must never come to rest, or sauce will separate and become oily.) Remove from heat and stir in capers
11. Pour lemon-caper sauce over chicken; serve with lemon wedges

NUTRITION INFO:
Total Fat 39g 50%, Saturated Fat 17g 86%, Cholesterol 160mg 53%, Sodium 372mg 16%, Total Carbohydrate 29g 11%, Dietary Fiber 2g 7%, Total Sugars 1g, Protein 43g, Vitamin C 27mg 134%, Calcium 47mg 4%, Iron 3mg 17%, Potassium 558mg 12%

Source: https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/132703/chicken-with-lemon-caper-sauce/

RECIPE 331: Butterflied Roast Chicken with Lemon and Rosemary
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 6
Prep Time: 10 mins
Cook Time: 50 mins
Total Time: 1 hrs
Rating: 4.4/5
Category: /Meat and Poultry/Chicken/Whole Chicken Recipes/

INGREDIENTS:
• 1 tablespoon olive oil
• or as needed
• 1 (3 pound) whole chicken
• backbone removed
• kosher salt and ground black pepper to taste
• 1 lemon
• sliced into rounds
• 4 sprigs fresh rosemary
• ½ cup white wine

DIRECTIONS:
1. Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
2. Line a rimmed baking pan with aluminum foil
3. Place a rack on top of foil
4. Rub olive oil on both sides of chicken and generously season with salt and black pepper
5. Arrange lemon slices and rosemary on the rack and place chicken, skin-side up, onto the rack
6. Roast in the preheated oven until no longer pink at the bone and the juices run clear, 45 to 55 minutes
7. An instant-read thermometer inserted into the thickest part of the thigh, near the bone should read 165 degrees F (74 degrees C)
8. Transfer chicken to a serving platter and tent a piece of aluminum foil over it
9. Discard lemon and rosemary and remove rack
10. Pour wine into the baking pan and gently loosen the bits of food in the pan with a wooden spoon, being careful not to tear the foil
11. Strain pan juices into a saucepan and bring to a boil; cook until sauce is slightly reduced, about 5 minutes
12. Spoon sauce over chicken

NUTRITION INFO:
Total Fat 12g 15%, Saturated Fat 3g 15%, Cholesterol 114mg 38%, Sodium 178mg 8%, Total Carbohydrate 3g 1%, Dietary Fiber 1g 3%, Total Sugars 0g, Protein 37g, Vitamin C 14mg 70%, Calcium 34mg 3%, Iron 2mg 10%, Potassium 354mg 8%

Source: https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/242362/butterflied-roast-chicken-with-lemon-and-rosemary/

============================================================

------------------------------------------------------------

INGREDIENTS:
• 1 cup water
• 2 teaspoons honey
• 1 teaspoon fresh lemon juice
• 1 teaspoon white sugar

DIRECTIONS:
1. Pour water into a mug
2. Add honey and heat in the microwave for 1 minute 30 seconds
3. Stir in lemon juice, mixing until honey is dissolved
4. Stir in sugar

NUTRITION INFO:

------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 15
Yield: 3 2/3 cups
Prep Time: 15 mins

Rating: 4.6/5
Category: /Desserts/Frostings and Icings/Lemon/

INGREDIENTS:

• softened

• 5 cups confectioners' sugar

DIRECTIONS:

RECIPE 334: Lemon Cream Cheese Bars
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 24
Yield: 1 9x13-inch baking dish
Prep Time: 15 mins
Cook Time: 30 mins
Total Time: 2 hrs 5 mins
Rating: 4.2/5
Category: /Desserts/Fruit Desserts/Lemon Dessert Recipes/

INGREDIENTS:
• cooking spray
• 2 (8 ounce) packages refrigerated crescent roll dough (such as Pillsbury® Recipe Creations®)
• divided
• 2 lemons
• zested and juiced
• divided
• 2 (8 ounce) packages cream cheese
• softened
• ½ cup white sugar
• 2 tablespoons butter
• melted
• 3 tablespoons white sugar

DIRECTIONS:
1. Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
2. Line the bottom of a 9x13-inch baking dish with aluminum foil and coat with cooking spray
3. Unroll 1 crescent roll dough; press into the bottom of the prepared baking dish, stretching to the edges
4. Mix together lemon juice and 3/4 of the lemon zest in a large bowl
5. Beat cream cheese and 1/2 cup sugar into juice-zest mixture with an electric mixer until smooth and creamy; spread over crescent roll dough in the baking dish
6. Unroll remaining crescent roll dough and place over cream cheese mixture, stretching to the edges
7. Brush melted butter on top
8. Mix together 3 tablespoons sugar and remaining lemon zest in a small bowl; sprinkle over melted butter
9. Bake in the preheated oven until top is golden brown, about 30 minutes
10. Allow to cool for about 20 minutes
11. Lift dessert from the baking dish using foil; transfer to a cutting board
12. Cut into squares, leaving on foil
13. Return dessert to the baking dish and refrigerate until chilled, at least 1 hour

NUTRITION INFO:
Total Fat 12g 15%, Saturated Fat 6g 29%, Cholesterol 23mg 8%, Sodium 209mg 9%, Total Carbohydrate 15g 5%, Dietary Fiber 0g 1%, Total Sugars 7g, Protein 3g, Vitamin C 7mg 36%, Calcium 21mg 2%, Iron 1mg 4%, Potassium 36mg 1%

Source: https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/237181/lemon-cream-cheese-bars/

============================================================

------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 4
Prep Time: 10 mins

Total Time: 15 mins
Rating: 4.4/5
Category: /Seafood/Fish/

INGREDIENTS:
• 1 tablespoon olive oil
• 4 (4 ounce) fillets orange roughy

• juiced
• 1 lemon
• juiced
• ½ teaspoon lemon pepper

DIRECTIONS:
1. Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat
2. Place fillets into hot oil
3. Drizzle with orange juice and lemon juice, then sprinkle fillets with lemon pepper
4. Cook until fish flakes easily with a fork, 2 to 3 minutes per side
5. An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 145 degrees F (63 degrees C)

NUTRITION INFO:

RECIPE 336: Olive Oil Roasted Eggplant with Lemon
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 4
Prep Time: 15 mins
Cook Time: 25 mins
Total Time: 40 mins
Rating: 4.2/5
Category: /Side Dish/Vegetables/Eggplant/

INGREDIENTS:
• 1 large eggplant
• 3 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil
• salt and pepper to taste
• 2 tablespoons fresh lemon juice

DIRECTIONS:
1. Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
2. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or lightly grease
3. Slice eggplant in half lengthwise, then cut each half into quarters lengthwise
4. Cut each piece in half to make two shorter quarters
5. Place eggplant skin-side down onto the prepared baking sheet
6. Brush with olive oil; season with salt and pepper
7. Roast in the preheated oven until softened and golden brown, 25 to 30 minutes
8. Remove from the oven and sprinkle with lemon juice

NUTRITION INFO:
Total Fat 10g 13%, Saturated Fat 2g 8%, Sodium 2mg 0%, Total Carbohydrate 7g 3%, Dietary Fiber 4g 14%, Total Sugars 3g, Protein 1g, Vitamin C 6mg 30%, Calcium 11mg 1%, Iron 0mg 2%, Potassium 273mg 6%

RECIPE 337: Wine Sauce for Seafood
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 4
Prep Time: 10 mins
Cook Time: 5 mins
Total Time: 15 mins
Rating: 4.4/5
Category: /Side Dish/Sauces and Condiments/Sauces/

INGREDIENTS:
• 3 tablespoons butter
• 2 tablespoons minced shallots
• 2 cloves garlic
• minced
• 1 teaspoon dried tarragon
• ¼ teaspoon salt
• ¼ teaspoon white pepper
• ¼ cup white wine
• 1 lemon
• juiced
• 1 tablespoon fresh parsley

DIRECTIONS:
1. Melt butter in a small saucepan over medium-low heat
2. Add shallots and garlic; cook and stir until shallots are translucent, about 3 minutes
3. Season with tarragon, salt, and white pepper
4. Increase heat to medium; stir in white wine and lemon juice
5. Bring to a simmer, then whisk for 1 minute
6. Remove from heat and sprinkle in parsley
7. Pour over your favorite white fish before serving

NUTRITION INFO:
Total Fat 9g 11%, Saturated Fat 6g 28%, Cholesterol 23mg 8%, Sodium 210mg 9%, Total Carbohydrate 5g 2%, Dietary Fiber 1g 5%, Total Sugars 0g, Protein 1g, Vitamin C 23mg 115%, Calcium 32mg 2%, Iron 1mg 3%, Potassium 94mg 2%

Source: https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/92911/wine-sauce-for-seafood/

RECIPE 338: Easy Lemon Cookies
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 36
Yield: 36 cookies
Prep Time: 10 mins
Cook Time: 10 mins
Total Time: 20 mins
Rating: 4.6/5
Category: /Desserts/Cookies/Drop Cookie Recipes/

INGREDIENTS:
• 1 (15.25 ounce) package lemon cake mix
• 2 large eggs
• ⅓ cup vegetable oil
• 1 teaspoon lemon extract
• ⅓ cup confectioners' sugar for decoration

DIRECTIONS:
1. Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
2. Pour cake mix into a large bowl
3. Stir in eggs, oil, and lemon extract until well blended
4. Working in batches, drop teaspoonfuls of dough into a bowl of confectioners' sugar
5. Roll dough in sugar until lightly coated, then place 2 inches apart onto ungreased cookie sheets
6. Bake in the preheated oven until the bottoms are light brown, 6 to 9 minutes

NUTRITION INFO:
Total Fat 4g 5%, Saturated Fat 1g 5%, Cholesterol 14mg 5%, Sodium 107mg 5%, Total Carbohydrate 12g 4%, Dietary Fiber 0g 0%, Total Sugars 7g, Protein 1g, Calcium 8mg 1%, Iron 0mg 2%, Potassium 16mg 0%

RECIPE 339: Lemon Rosemary Salmon
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 2
Prep Time: 10 mins
Cook Time: 20 mins
Total Time: 30 mins
Rating: 4.5/5
Category: /Main Dishes/Seafood Main Dishes/Salmon/Baked Salmon Recipes/

INGREDIENTS:
• 1 lemon
• thinly sliced
• 4 sprigs fresh rosemary
• 2 salmon fillets
• bones and skin removed
• coarse salt to taste
• 1 tablespoon olive oil
• or as needed

DIRECTIONS:
1. Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
2. Arrange half the lemon slices in a single layer in a baking dish
3. Layer with 2 sprigs rosemary, and top with salmon fillets
4. Sprinkle salmon with salt, layer with remaining rosemary sprigs, and top with remaining lemon slices
5. Drizzle with olive oil
6. Bake 20 minutes in the preheated oven, or until fish is easily flaked with a fork

RECIPE 340: Sautéed Swiss Chard with Parmesan Cheese
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 4
Prep Time: 15 mins
Cook Time: 10 mins
Total Time: 25 mins
Rating: 4.6/5
Category: /Side Dish/Vegetables/Greens/

INGREDIENTS:
• 2 tablespoons olive oil
• 2 tablespoons butter
• ½ small red onion
• diced
• 1 tablespoon minced garlic
• 1 bunch Swiss chard
• stems and center ribs cut out and chopped together
• leaves coarsely chopped separately
• ½ cup dry white wine
• 1 tablespoon fresh lemon juice
• or to taste
• 2 tablespoons freshly grated Parmesan cheese
• 1 pinch salt to taste

DIRECTIONS:
1. Heat olive oil and butter together in a large skillet over medium-high heat
2. Stir in onion and garlic and sauté until fragrant, about 30 seconds
3. Add chard stems and white wine; simmer until the stems begin to soften, about 5 minutes
4. Stir in the chard leaves and cook until just wilted
5. Sprinkle lemon juice on top and stir to combine; add Parmesan cheese and season to taste with salt if needed. dotdash meredith food studios

NUTRITION INFO:
Total Fat 13g 17%, Saturated Fat 5g 25%, Cholesterol 18mg 6%, Sodium 202mg 9%, Total Carbohydrate 5g 2%, Dietary Fiber 1g 4%, Total Sugars 1g, Protein 2g, Vitamin C 20mg 101%, Calcium 67mg 5%, Iron 1mg 7%, Potassium 268mg 6%

RECIPE 341: Old Fashioned Cocktail
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 1
Prep Time: 5 mins
Total Time: 5 mins
Rating: 4.7/5
Category: /Drinks Recipes/Cocktail Recipes/Whiskey Drinks Recipes/

INGREDIENTS:
• 1 sugar cube
• 1 teaspoon water
• 1 dash bitters
• 2 fluid ounces whiskey (rye or bourbon)
• 1 lemon twist
• ½ cup ice cubes
• or as needed
• 1 orange slice
• for garnish
• 1 maraschino cherry
• for garnish

DIRECTIONS:
1. Muddle sugar cube, water, and bitters in an old fashioned glass for 1 minute
2. Pour in whiskey; stir for 1 minute
3. Squeeze lemon twist over the glass and drop it in
4. Add ice cubes
5. Garnish with orange slice and maraschino cherry; serve with a swizzle stick

NUTRITION INFO:
Sodium 7mg 0%, Total Carbohydrate 7g 3%, Dietary Fiber 0g 0%, Total Sugars 4g, Calcium 8mg 1%, Potassium 12mg 0%

Source: https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/221320/old-fashioned-cocktail/
