RECIPE 608: Air Fryer Roasted Bananas
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 1
Prep Time: 5 mins
Cook Time: 10 mins
Total Time: 15 mins
Rating: 4.5/5
Category: /Desserts/Fruit Desserts/Banana Dessert Recipes/

INGREDIENTS:
• 1 banana
• sliced into 1/8-inch thick diagonals
• avocado oil cooking spray

DIRECTIONS:
1. Preheat an air fryer to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) according to manufacturer's instructions
2. Line the air fryer basket, if desired
3. Place banana slices into the basket, making sure that they are not touching; cook in batches if necessary
4. Mist banana slices with avocado oil
5. Cook in the air fryer for 5 minutes
6. Remove the basket and flip banana slices carefully (they will be soft)
7. Cook until banana slices are browned and caramelized, an additional 2 to 3 minutes
8. Carefully remove from basket

NUTRITION INFO:
Total Fat 1g 1%, Saturated Fat 0g 1%, Sodium 1mg 0%, Total Carbohydrate 27g 10%, Dietary Fiber 3g 11%, Total Sugars 14g, Protein 1g, Vitamin C 10mg 52%, Calcium 6mg 0%, Iron 0mg 2%, Potassium 422mg 9%

Source: https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/272347/air-fryer-roasted-bananas/

============================================================

RECIPE 609: Banana Chocolate Chip Cookies
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 18
Yield: 3 dozen
Prep Time: 15 mins
Cook Time: 15 mins
Total Time: 1 hrs 15 mins
Rating: 4.2/5
Category: /Desserts/Fruit Desserts/Banana Dessert Recipes/

INGREDIENTS:
• 2 ½ cups all-purpose flour
• 2 teaspoons baking powder
• ½ teaspoon salt
• ¼ teaspoon baking soda
• 1 cup white sugar
• ⅔ cup butter
• softened
• 1 cup mashed bananas
• 2 eggs
• 1 teaspoon vanilla extract
• 2 cups semisweet chocolate chips

DIRECTIONS:
1. Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
2. Grease cookie sheets
3. Sift flour, baking powder, salt, and baking soda together in a large bowl
4. Beat sugar and butter together in a separate large bowl with an electric mixer until light and fluffy
5. Add bananas, eggs, and vanilla; beat to combine
6. Gradually blend in flour mixture until just combined; stir in chocolate chips
7. Drop dough by teaspoonfuls onto prepared cookie sheets
8. Bake in the preheated oven for 12 to 15 minutes
9. Transfer cookies to a wire rack to cool completely

NUTRITION INFO:
Total Fat 13g 17%, Saturated Fat 8g 39%, Cholesterol 39mg 13%, Sodium 195mg 8%, Total Carbohydrate 39g 14%, Dietary Fiber 2g 7%, Total Sugars 23g, Protein 4g, Vitamin C 1mg 6%, Calcium 44mg 3%, Iron 2mg 9%, Potassium 142mg 3%

Source: https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/11201/banana-chocolate-chip-cookies/

RECIPE 610: Best Yet Banana Mini Muffins
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 48
Yield: 48 mini muffins
Prep Time: 20 mins
Cook Time: 15 mins
Total Time: 35 mins
Rating: 4.7/5
Category: /Bread/Quick Bread Recipes/Muffin Recipes/Banana Muffin Recipes/

INGREDIENTS:
• cooking spray
• 1 ½ cups all-purpose flour
• 1 teaspoon baking powder
• 1 teaspoon baking soda
• 3 bananas
• mashed
• ¾ cup white sugar
• ⅓ cup melted butter
• 1 egg
• beaten

DIRECTIONS:
1. Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
2. Grease 2 mini muffin tins with cooking spray
3. Combine flour, baking powder, and baking soda in a bowl
4. Blend bananas, sugar, butter, and egg together in a separate bowl
5. Add to flour mixture; stir batter well to combine
6. Scoop batter into prepared muffin cups, filling each 2/3 full
7. Bake in the preheated oven until tops spring back when lightly pressed, about 15 minutes
8. Cool in the tins for 5 minutes
9. Transfer to a wire rack to cool completely

NUTRITION INFO:
Total Fat 2g 2%, Saturated Fat 1g 5%, Cholesterol 7mg 2%, Sodium 47mg 2%, Total Carbohydrate 8g 3%, Dietary Fiber 0g 1%, Total Sugars 4g, Protein 1g, Vitamin C 1mg 3%, Calcium 8mg 1%, Iron 0mg 1%, Potassium 32mg 1%

Source: https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/246624/best-yet-banana-mini-muffins/

RECIPE 611: Homemade Banana Pudding
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 4
Prep Time: 10 mins
Cook Time: 20 mins
Total Time: 1 hrs 30 mins
Rating: 4.4/5
Category: /Desserts/Fruit Desserts/Banana Dessert Recipes/

INGREDIENTS:
• ⅔ cup white sugar
• ⅓ cup all-purpose flour
• ¼ teaspoon salt
• 3 eggs
• beaten
• 2 cups milk
• 2 tablespoons butter
• softened
• ½ teaspoon vanilla extract
• 2 bananas
• peeled and sliced
• ½ (12 ounce) package vanilla wafer cookies

DIRECTIONS:
1. Combine sugar, flour, and salt together in a medium saucepan
2. Add eggs and stir well
3. Stir in milk, and cook over low heat, stirring constantly
4. When the mixture has thickened enough to coat the back of a metal spoon, remove from heat and continue to stir, cooling slightly
5. Stir in butter and vanilla until smooth
6. Layer pudding with bananas and vanilla wafers in a serving dish
7. Chill at least 1 hour in the refrigerator before serving

NUTRITION INFO:
Total Fat 28g 36%, Saturated Fat 11g 55%, Cholesterol 505mg 168%, Sodium 382mg 17%, Total Carbohydrate 91g 33%, Dietary Fiber 3g 10%, Total Sugars 46g, Protein 14g, Vitamin C 5mg 27%, Calcium 211mg 16%, Iron 3mg 16%, Potassium 489mg 10%

Source: https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/18990/banana-pudding-i/

============================================================

RECIPE 612: Banana Pumpkin Bread
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 12
Yield: 1 9x5-inch loaf pan
Prep Time: 20 mins
Cook Time: 45 mins
Total Time: 1 hrs 5 mins
Rating: 4.3/5
Category: /Bread/Quick Bread Recipes/Pumpkin Bread Recipes/

INGREDIENTS:
• 2 ripe bananas
• mashed
• 1 ⅓ cups canned pumpkin puree
• ½ cup honey
• ½ cup white sugar
• ⅓ cup vegetable oil
• 2 large eggs
• 2 ½ cups all-purpose flour
• 2 teaspoons pumpkin pie spice
• 1 teaspoon baking powder
• 1 teaspoon baking soda
• 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon
• ½ teaspoon salt
• ¾ cup raisins (Optional)
• ½ cup walnut pieces (Optional)

DIRECTIONS:
1. Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
2. Grease a 9x5-inch loaf pan
3. Stir together bananas, pumpkin, honey, sugar, vegetable oil, and eggs in a large bowl
4. Combine flour, pie spice, baking powder, baking soda, cinnamon, and salt in a separate bowl
5. Stir flour mixture into banana mixture until just combined
6. Fold in raisins and walnuts
7. Pour batter into the prepared pan
8. Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into the center of the loaf comes out clean, about 45 minutes
9. Cool loaf in the pan for 10 minutes before transferring to a wire rack to cool completely

NUTRITION INFO:
Total Fat 11g 14%, Saturated Fat 2g 8%, Cholesterol 31mg 10%, Sodium 258mg 11%, Total Carbohydrate 56g 20%, Dietary Fiber 3g 10%, Total Sugars 30g, Protein 5g, Vitamin C 3mg 17%, Calcium 54mg 4%, Iron 2mg 13%, Potassium 275mg 6%

Source: https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/16706/banana-pumpkin-bread/

============================================================

RECIPE 613: Banana Bread - Quick Bread for Machines
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 10
Yield: 1 1-pound loaf
Prep Time: 15 mins
Cook Time: 50 mins
Total Time: 1 hrs 15 mins
Rating: 4.1/5
Category: /Breakfast and Brunch/Breakfast Bread Recipes/

INGREDIENTS:
• 2 bananas
• peeled and halved lengthwise
• 2 cups all-purpose flour
• ¾ cup white sugar
• 2 large eggs
• 3 tablespoons vegetable oil
• 1 teaspoon baking powder
• ½ teaspoon baking soda

DIRECTIONS:
1. Place bananas, flour, sugar, eggs, oil, baking powder, and baking soda in the pan of the bread machine
2. Select Dough setting; press Start
3. Mix dough until well combined and bananas are mashed, 3 to 5 minutes
4. Use a rubber spatula to push dough from the sides of the bread pan if necessary
5. Press Stop, then smooth out the top of the loaf with a rubber spatula
6. Select Bake setting; press Start
7. Bake in the bread machine until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean, about 50 minutes
8. If there is batter on the toothpick, reset the machine on Bake and continue baking for 10 to 15 minutes
9. Remove the pan from the machine
10. Allow bread to remain in the pan for 10 minutes before transferring it to a wire rack to cool completely

NUTRITION INFO:
Total Fat 5g 7%, Saturated Fat 1g 5%, Cholesterol 37mg 12%, Sodium 126mg 5%, Total Carbohydrate 40g 14%, Dietary Fiber 1g 5%, Total Sugars 18g, Protein 4g, Vitamin C 2mg 11%, Calcium 37mg 3%, Iron 2mg 8%, Potassium 125mg 3%

Source: https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/7116/banana-bread-quick-bread-for-machines/

============================================================

RECIPE 614: Banana Fritters
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 6
Yield: 24 fritters
Prep Time: 10 mins
Cook Time: 5 mins
Total Time: 15 mins
Rating: 4.0/5
Category: /Desserts/Fruit Desserts/Banana Dessert Recipes/

INGREDIENTS:
• 2 bananas
• mashed
• ½ cup milk
• 2 cups all-purpose flour
• 3 teaspoons baking powder
• ½ teaspoon salt
• 2 eggs
• beaten
• 1 tablespoon margarine
• melted
• 1 quart vegetable oil for frying
• ½ cup confectioners' sugar
• or as needed

DIRECTIONS:
1. Combine bananas and milk in a large mixing bowl; sift in flour, baking powder, and salt
2. Add eggs and margarine; mix well to combine
3. Heat oil in a large, deep skillet to 365 degrees F (180 degrees C)
4. Carefully place spoonfuls of the fritter mixture into the hot oil; cook, flipping once, until golden brown, about 5 minutes
5. Remove, and drain on a paper towel-lined plate
6. Dust fritters with confectioners' sugar and serve warm

NUTRITION INFO:
Total Fat 19g 24%, Saturated Fat 3g 16%, Cholesterol 64mg 21%, Sodium 427mg 19%, Total Carbohydrate 53g 19%, Dietary Fiber 2g 8%, Total Sugars 16g, Protein 8g, Vitamin C 4mg 18%, Calcium 141mg 11%, Iron 3mg 14%, Potassium 240mg 5%

Source: https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/20490/banana-fritters/

RECIPE 615: Blueberry Banana Bread
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 15
Yield: 3 mini loaves
Prep Time: 15 mins
Cook Time: 30 mins
Total Time: 55 mins
Rating: 4.7/5
Category: /Bread/Quick Bread Recipes/Fruit Bread Recipes/Banana Bread/

INGREDIENTS:
• 2 cups all-purpose flour
• 1 teaspoon baking soda
• ½ teaspoon salt
• 1 cup white sugar
• ½ cup butter
• softened
• 2 large eggs
• 2 teaspoons vanilla extract
• 2 ripe bananas
• mashed
• 1 cup fresh blueberries

DIRECTIONS:
1. Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
2. Grease 3 mini loaf pans
3. Mix together flour, baking soda, and salt in a medium bowl
4. Beat sugar and butter with an electric mixer in a large bowl until light in color and fluffy
5. Add eggs, one at a time, mixing well after each addition
6. Stir in vanilla extract; beat in mashed bananas
7. Add flour mixture a little at a time, beating until just combined into a thick batter
8. Fold in blueberries until evenly distributed
9. Pour batter into the prepared loaf pans
10. Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean, 30 to 35 minutes
11. Cool in the pans for 10 minutes, then transfer loaves to cool completely on a wire rack

NUTRITION INFO:
Total Fat 7g 9%, Saturated Fat 4g 21%, Cholesterol 41mg 14%, Sodium 215mg 9%, Total Carbohydrate 31g 11%, Dietary Fiber 1g 4%, Total Sugars 16g, Protein 3g, Vitamin C 2mg 12%, Calcium 10mg 1%, Iron 1mg 6%, Potassium 94mg 2%

Source: https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/229021/blueberry-banana-bread/

============================================================

RECIPE 616: Almost No Fat Banana Bread
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 12
Yield: 1 8x4-inch loaf
Prep Time: 10 mins
Cook Time: 55 mins
Total Time: 1 hrs 5 mins
Rating: 4.4/5
Category: /Bread/Quick Bread Recipes/Fruit Bread Recipes/Banana Bread/

INGREDIENTS:
• cooking spray
• 1 ½ cups all-purpose flour
• ¾ cup white sugar
• 1 ¼ teaspoons baking powder
• ½ teaspoon baking soda
• ½ teaspoon ground cinnamon
• 1 cup banana
• mashed
• ¼ cup applesauce
• 2 egg whites

DIRECTIONS:
1. Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
2. Lightly grease an 8x4-inch loaf pan
3. Stir flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, and cinnamon together in a large bowl
4. Add banana, applesauce, and egg whites; stir just until combined
5. Pour batter into the prepared pan
6. Bake in preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean, 50 to 55 minutes
7. Turn out onto a wire rack and allow to cool before slicing

NUTRITION INFO:
Total Fat 0g 0%, Sodium 100mg 4%, Total Carbohydrate 30g 11%, Dietary Fiber 1g 4%, Total Sugars 15g, Protein 2g, Vitamin C 2mg 9%, Calcium 26mg 2%, Iron 1mg 4%, Potassium 98mg 2%

Source: https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/23426/almost-no-fat-banana-bread/

RECIPE 617: Banana Chocolate Chip Cake
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 24
Yield: 1 9x13-inch cake
Prep Time: 15 mins
Cook Time: 30 mins
Total Time: 45 mins
Rating: 4.5/5
Category: /Desserts/Fruit Desserts/Banana Dessert Recipes/

INGREDIENTS:
• 1 ½ cups all-purpose flour
• ⅔ cup white sugar
• 1 ½ teaspoons baking powder
• ¼ teaspoon salt
• 1 cup mashed bananas
• ½ cup unsalted butter
• melted
• ¼ cup milk
• 1 large egg
• ¾ cup semisweet chocolate chips

DIRECTIONS:
1. Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
2. Grease and flour a 9x13-inch baking dish
3. Mix flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt in a large bowl
4. Whisk together bananas, melted butter, milk, and egg in a medium bowl
5. Stir banana mixture into flour mixture until just blended
6. Stir in chocolate chips
7. Pour batter into the prepared baking dish
8. Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into the center of cake comes out clean with no crumbs (melted chocolate on the toothpick is fine), 30 to 35 minutes

NUTRITION INFO:
Total Fat 6g 7%, Saturated Fat 4g 18%, Cholesterol 18mg 6%, Sodium 60mg 3%, Total Carbohydrate 17g 6%, Dietary Fiber 1g 3%, Total Sugars 10g, Protein 2g, Vitamin C 1mg 4%, Calcium 26mg 2%, Iron 1mg 3%, Potassium 69mg 1%

Source: https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/8302/banana-chocolate-chip-cake/

RECIPE 618: Hearty Breakfast Muffins
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 12
Yield: 12 muffins
Prep Time: 20 mins
Cook Time: 20 mins
Total Time: 50 mins
Rating: 4.7/5
Category: /Bread/Quick Bread Recipes/Zucchini Bread Recipes/

INGREDIENTS:
• 2 carrots
• shredded
• 2 bananas
• mashed
• 1 zucchini
• shredded
• ¼ cup vegetable oil
• ¼ cup yogurt
• 2 eggs
• 1 cup whole wheat flour
• 1 ½ teaspoons baking soda
• ½ cup packed brown sugar
• ½ cup rolled oats
• ½ cup shredded coconut
• ½ cup chopped pecans
• ½ cup dried cherries
• 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon
• 1 teaspoon salt
• ½ teaspoon ground ginger

DIRECTIONS:
1. Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
2. Grease 12 muffin cups or line with paper liners
3. Mix carrots, banana, zucchini, vegetable oil, yogurt, and eggs together in a large bowl until well combined
4. Whisk flour and baking soda together in a separate bowl
5. Mix brown sugar, oats, coconut, pecans, cherries, cinnamon, salt, and ginger into flour mixture until all ingredients are coated in flour
6. Stir banana mixture into flour mixture until just combined
7. Spoon batter into the prepared muffin cups, filling each 2/3 full
8. Bake in the preheated oven until tops spring back when lightly pressed, about 18 to 22 minutes
9. Cool in the tin for 10 minutes
10. Transfer to a wire rack to cool completely

NUTRITION INFO:
Total Fat 10g 13%, Saturated Fat 2g 11%, Cholesterol 31mg 10%, Sodium 388mg 17%, Total Carbohydrate 32g 12%, Dietary Fiber 4g 14%, Total Sugars 17g, Protein 5g, Vitamin C 5mg 26%, Calcium 42mg 3%, Iron 1mg 6%, Potassium 265mg 6%

Source: https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/231643/hearty-breakfast-muffins/

============================================================

RECIPE 619: Bob's Stuffed Banana Peppers
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 8
Yield: 8 stuffed peppers
Prep Time: 30 mins
Cook Time: 1 hrs 30 mins
Total Time: 2 hrs
Rating: 4.6/5
Category: /Cuisine/European/Italian/

INGREDIENTS:
• 8 banana peppers
• 2 tablespoons butter
• ½ cup chopped onion
• ½ cup chopped celery
• 1 (28 ounce) can crushed tomatoes
• 1 (8 ounce) can tomato sauce
• 2 cloves garlic
• minced
• 2 ½ teaspoons salt
• divided
• 1 teaspoon dried basil
• 1 teaspoon dried oregano
• ½ teaspoon ground black pepper
• divided
• ½ cup grated Parmesan cheese
• 1 large egg
• 1 teaspoon Worcestershire sauce
• 1 pound hot Italian sausage
• 1 pound mild Italian sausage
• 1 ½ cups bread crumbs

DIRECTIONS:
1. Cut off the tops of peppers
2. Remove ribs and seeds; rinse peppers
3. Chop edible portion of the tops; set aside
4. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil
5. Add peppers, reduce heat, and simmer until tender but still firm, about 5 minutes
6. Drain and set aside
7. Heat butter in a medium skillet over medium heat
8. Sauté reserved chopped pepper, onion, and celery in hot butter until tender, 3 to 5 minutes
9. Stir in crushed tomatoes, tomato sauce, and garlic
10. Season with 1 1/2 teaspoons salt, basil, oregano, and 1/4 teaspoon black pepper
11. Simmer uncovered for 10 minutes
12. Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
13. Meanwhile, combine Parmesan cheese, egg, Worcestershire sauce, 1 remaining teaspoon salt, and remaining 1/4 teaspoon black pepper in a large bowl
14. Mix in hot sausage, mild sausage, bread crumbs, and 1 cup tomato sauce mixture until well combined
15. Fill each pepper with sausage mixture using a piping bag or sausage stuffer
16. Place in a 3-quart casserole dish; pour remaining tomato sauce mixture over peppers
17. Bake uncovered in the preheated oven until sauce is bubbly and sausage is cooked through, about 1 hour
18. An instant-read thermometer inserted into the filling should read at least 160 degrees F (72 degrees C)

NUTRITION INFO:
Total Fat 43g 54%, Saturated Fat 16g 81%, Cholesterol 123mg 41%, Sodium 2125mg 92%, Total Carbohydrate 29g 10%, Dietary Fiber 5g 19%, Total Sugars 4g, Protein 25g, Vitamin C 53mg 264%, Calcium 189mg 15%, Iron 5mg 25%, Potassium 893mg 19%

Source: https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/23074/bobs-stuffed-banana-peppers/

============================================================

RECIPE 620: Easy Kids' Recipe for Fluffy Banana Cookies
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 12
Yield: 1 9x13-inch baking sheet
Prep Time: 10 mins
Cook Time: 15 mins
Total Time: 25 mins
Rating: 4.8/5
Category: /Desserts/Fruit Desserts/Banana Dessert Recipes/

INGREDIENTS:
• 2 ripe bananas
• mashed
• or more to taste
• 1 ½ cups all-purpose flour
• ½ cup white sugar
• or more to taste
• ¼ cup butter
• melted
• ¼ cup chopped walnuts (Optional)
• 1 egg
• 1 teaspoon baking soda
• ¼ teaspoon salt
• 1 tablespoon white sugar

DIRECTIONS:
1. Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C)
2. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper
3. Place bananas, flour, 1/2 cup sugar, butter, walnuts, egg, baking soda, and salt in a bowl
4. Mix until well combined
5. Drop 3 tablespoonfuls of dough 2 to 3 inches apart onto baking sheet
6. Sprinkle 1 tablespoon sugar on top
7. Bake in the preheated oven until golden brown and edges are set, 15 to 20 minutes

NUTRITION INFO:
Total Fat 6g 8%, Saturated Fat 3g 14%, Cholesterol 24mg 8%, Sodium 186mg 8%, Total Carbohydrate 26g 10%, Dietary Fiber 1g 4%, Total Sugars 12g, Protein 3g, Vitamin C 2mg 9%, Calcium 9mg 1%, Iron 1mg 5%, Potassium 104mg 2%

RECIPE 622: Strawberry Banana Protein Smoothie
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 1
Prep Time: 10 mins
Total Time: 10 mins
Rating: 4.7/5
Category: /Breakfast and Brunch/Drinks/

INGREDIENTS:
• 1 ¼ cups sliced fresh strawberries
• 1 banana
• 10 whole almonds
• 2 tablespoons water
• 1 cup ice cubes
• 3 tablespoons chocolate flavored protein powder

DIRECTIONS:
1. Place strawberries, banana, almonds, and water into a blender; blend to combine
2. Add ice cubes and puree until smooth
3. Add protein powder and mix until evenly incorporated, about 30 seconds

RECIPE 623: Baked Banana Chips
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 2
Prep Time: 10 mins
Cook Time: 2 hrs
Total Time: 2 hrs 15 mins
Rating: 2.3/5
Category: /Appetizers and Snacks/Snacks/Snack Chip Recipes/

INGREDIENTS:
• 2 just-ripe bananas
• sliced in 1/10-inch-thick rounds
• or more as needed
• 1 teaspoon lemon juice
• or to taste

DIRECTIONS:
1. Preheat the oven to 225 degrees F (110 degrees C)
2. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper
3. Spread banana slices out onto the prepared baking sheet, making sure slices are not touching
4. Brush with lemon juice
5. Bake in the preheated oven for 90 minutes
6. Check bananas, lifting slices up to separate from the paper once or twice
7. Continue baking until bananas are dried out, 30 to 90 minutes more
8. Let bananas cool until crispy, at least 5 minutes

NUTRITION INFO:
Total Fat 0g 1%, Saturated Fat 0g 1%, Sodium 1mg 0%, Total Carbohydrate 27g 10%, Dietary Fiber 3g 11%, Total Sugars 15g, Protein 1g, Vitamin C 12mg 58%, Calcium 6mg 0%, Iron 0mg 2%, Potassium 426mg 9%

Source: https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/261342/baked-banana-chips/

RECIPE 624: Porridge
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 4
Prep Time: 5 mins
Cook Time: 10 mins
Total Time: 15 mins
Rating: 3.7/5
Category: /Breakfast and Brunch/Cereals/Oatmeal Recipes/

INGREDIENTS:
• 2 ½ cups water
• 1 cup rolled oats
• 1 tablespoon white sugar
• 1 teaspoon salt
• 2 bananas
• sliced
• 1 pinch ground cinnamon
• ½ cup cold milk (Optional)

DIRECTIONS:
1. Combine water, oats, sugar, and salt in a saucepan
2. Add bananas and cinnamon
3. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat to low, and simmer until the liquid has been absorbed, stirring frequently
4. Pour into bowls, and top each with a splash of cold milk

NUTRITION INFO:
Total Fat 2g 3%, Saturated Fat 1g 4%, Cholesterol 2mg 1%, Sodium 600mg 26%, Total Carbohydrate 32g 12%, Dietary Fiber 4g 13%, Total Sugars 12g, Protein 4g, Vitamin C 5mg 26%, Calcium 57mg 4%, Iron 1mg 6%, Potassium 333mg 7%

Source: https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/73155/porridge/

RECIPE 625: Brown Sugar Banana Bread
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 8
Yield: 1 9x5-inch loaf
Prep Time: 15 mins
Cook Time: 40 mins
Total Time: 55 mins
Rating: 4.5/5
Category: /Breakfast and Brunch/Breakfast Bread Recipes/

INGREDIENTS:
• 4 ripe bananas
• cut into chunks
• 1 ¼ cups light brown sugar
• ½ cup butter
• softened
• 1 egg
• 1 teaspoon cinnamon
• 1 teaspoon vanilla extract
• ¼ cup whole milk
• 2 cups all-purpose flour
• ½ teaspoon baking soda
• 1 teaspoon baking powder
• ½ teaspoon kosher salt

DIRECTIONS:
1. Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
2. Grease a 9x5-inch loaf pan
3. Place the bananas into a large plastic zipper bag, seal the bag, and smoosh the bananas with your fingers until very well mashed
4. Set the bananas aside
5. Place the brown sugar and butter into a mixing bowl, and mix on medium speed with an electric mixer until light and fluffy, 1 to 2 minutes
6. Cut a corner from the plastic bag, and squeeze the mashed bananas into the bowl of brown sugar mixture
7. With the electric mixer on medium speed, beat in the bananas, egg, cinnamon, vanilla extract, and milk until the mixture is well combined
8. Switch the mixer to low speed, and gradually beat in the flour, baking soda, baking powder, and kosher salt just until the batter is smooth, about 1 minute
9. Spread the batter into the prepared loaf pan
10. Bake in the preheated oven until the bread is set and lightly browned on top, about 40 minutes
11. A toothpick inserted into the center of the loaf should come out clean

NUTRITION INFO:
Total Fat 13g 17%, Saturated Fat 8g 39%, Cholesterol 55mg 18%, Sodium 364mg 16%, Total Carbohydrate 72g 26%, Dietary Fiber 3g 9%, Total Sugars 41g, Protein 5g, Vitamin C 5mg 26%, Calcium 88mg 7%, Iron 2mg 12%, Potassium 315mg 7%

Source: https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/214581/brown-sugar-banana-bread/

============================================================

RECIPE 626: Hummingbird Cake
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 15
Yield: 2 9-inch cake pans
Prep Time: 20 mins
Cook Time: 1 hrs
Total Time: 1 hrs 20 mins
Rating: 4.6/5
Category: /Desserts/Fruit Desserts/Banana Dessert Recipes/

INGREDIENTS:
• 3 cups all-purpose flour
• 2 cups white sugar
• 1 teaspoon baking soda
• 1 teaspoon salt
• 2 cups mashed bananas
• 1 ½ cups canola oil
• 1 cup chopped black walnuts
• 1 (8 ounce) can crushed pineapple
• drained
• 3 large eggs

DIRECTIONS:
1. Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
2. Grease and flour two 9-inch cake pans
3. Make cake: Sift together flour, sugar, baking soda, and salt in a large bowl
4. Combine bananas, oil, walnuts, pineapple, and eggs in another large bowl; mix well
5. Stir flour mixture into banana mixture until combined
6. Pour batter into the prepared pans
7. Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into the center of each pan comes out clean, about 1 hour
8. Allow cakes to cool on wire racks
9. Meanwhile, make frosting: Beat together confectioners' sugar, cream cheese, butter, and vanilla in a medium bowl until smooth
10. Evenly spread frosting on the middle, sides, and top of cooled cake
11. Danielle K

NUTRITION INFO:
Total Fat 40g 51%, Saturated Fat 10g 48%, Cholesterol 70mg 23%, Sodium 342mg 15%, Total Carbohydrate 86g 31%, Dietary Fiber 2g 8%, Total Sugars 62g, Protein 7g, Vitamin C 4mg 21%, Calcium 32mg 2%, Iron 2mg 11%, Potassium 231mg 5%

Source: https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/15750/hummingbird-cake/

RECIPE 627: Clean Banana Oat Cookies
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 12
Yield: 12 cookies
Prep Time: 10 mins
Cook Time: 15 mins
Total Time: 25 mins
Rating: 3.9/5
Category: /Breakfast and Brunch/

INGREDIENTS:
• 2 bananas
• mashed
• ¼ cup milk
• 1 large egg
• beaten
• 1 teaspoon honey
• ½ teaspoon vanilla extract
• 1 cup rolled oats
• or as needed
• 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon
• ½ teaspoon baking powder
• ⅛ teaspoon salt

DIRECTIONS:
1. Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
2. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper
3. Mix together mashed bananas, milk, egg, honey, and vanilla in a bowl
4. Stir in oats, cinnamon, baking powder, and salt until well combined
5. Add more oats if the batter is too runny
6. Spoon mounds of batter a few inches apart onto the prepared baking sheet
7. Bake in the preheated oven until the tops look dry and edges are golden, about 15 minutes

NUTRITION INFO:
Total Fat 1g 1%, Saturated Fat 0g 2%, Cholesterol 16mg 5%, Sodium 53mg 2%, Total Carbohydrate 10g 4%, Dietary Fiber 1g 5%, Total Sugars 3g, Protein 2g, Vitamin C 2mg 9%, Calcium 26mg 2%, Iron 1mg 3%, Potassium 110mg 2%

RECIPE 628: Quick Banana Milkshake (Ice Cream Free)
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 2
Prep Time: 5 mins
Total Time: 5 mins
Rating: 4.6/5
Category: /Drinks Recipes/Shakes and Floats Recipes/

INGREDIENTS:
• 3 ice cubes
• 1 cup milk
• 1 banana
• 1 tablespoon white sugar
• or to taste
• 1 pinch ground cinnamon

DIRECTIONS:
1. Combine ice, milk, banana, sugar, and cinnamon in a blender; blend until smooth

NUTRITION INFO:
Total Fat 3g 3%, Saturated Fat 2g 8%, Cholesterol 10mg 3%, Sodium 52mg 2%, Total Carbohydrate 26g 9%, Dietary Fiber 2g 6%, Total Sugars 19g, Protein 5g, Vitamin C 5mg 27%, Calcium 152mg 12%, Iron 0mg 1%, Potassium 397mg 8%

Source: https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/231180/quick-banana-milkshake-ice-cream-free/

RECIPE 629: Banana Bran Muffins
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 12
Yield: 12 muffins
Prep Time: 10 mins
Cook Time: 20 mins
Total Time: 35 mins
Rating: 4.7/5
Category: /Bread/Quick Bread Recipes/Fruit Bread Recipes/Banana Bread/

INGREDIENTS:
• ½ cup butter
• softened
• ½ cup brown sugar
• 3 bananas
• mashed
• 2 large eggs
• ¼ cup milk
• 1 teaspoon vanilla extract
• 1 ½ cups all-purpose flour
• ½ cup wheat bran
• 1 teaspoon baking powder
• 1 teaspoon baking soda
• ¼ teaspoon salt
• ½ cup chopped walnuts

DIRECTIONS:
1. Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
2. Grease a muffin pan or line with paper liners
3. Cream together butter and brown sugar in a large bowl with an electric mixer on medium speed until fluffy
4. Add mashed bananas, eggs, milk, and vanilla; mix well
5. Stir in flour, bran, baking powder, baking soda, and salt; blend just until moistened
6. Stir in walnuts
7. Pour batter into the prepared muffin cups
8. Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into the center of a muffin comes out clean, 20 to 25 minutes
9. Cool muffins in the pan for 5 minutes, then transfer to a wire rack to cool completely

NUTRITION INFO:
Total Fat 12g 16%, Saturated Fat 6g 28%, Cholesterol 52mg 17%, Sodium 266mg 12%, Total Carbohydrate 30g 11%, Dietary Fiber 3g 9%, Total Sugars 13g, Protein 4g, Vitamin C 3mg 13%, Calcium 53mg 4%, Iron 2mg 8%, Potassium 207mg 4%

Source: https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/16666/banana-bran-muffins/

RECIPE 631: Banana Loaf
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 12
Yield: 1 9x5-inch loaf
Prep Time: 10 mins
Cook Time: 1 hrs
Total Time: 1 hrs 10 mins
Rating: 4.6/5
Category: /Bread/Quick Bread Recipes/Fruit Bread Recipes/Banana Bread/

INGREDIENTS:
• 1 cup white sugar
• ½ cup butter
• 2 large eggs
• 3 ripe bananas
• mashed
• 2 cups all-purpose flour
• 1 teaspoon baking soda
• 1 teaspoon baking powder
• ½ teaspoon salt
• ½ cup chopped walnuts

DIRECTIONS:
1. Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
2. Lightly grease a 9x5-inch loaf pan
3. Cream sugar and butter in a large bowl with an electric mixer on medium speed until light and fluffy
4. Add eggs, one at a time, beating well after each addition
5. Mix in mashed bananas
6. Sift together flour, baking soda, baking powder, and salt in a separate bowl; beat into banana mixture just until combined
7. Fold in nuts
8. Pour batter into the prepared pan
9. Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into the center of the loaf comes out clean, about 1 hour

NUTRITION INFO:
Total Fat 12g 15%, Saturated Fat 6g 28%, Cholesterol 51mg 17%, Sodium 299mg 13%, Total Carbohydrate 40g 15%, Dietary Fiber 2g 6%, Total Sugars 21g, Protein 4g, Vitamin C 3mg 13%, Calcium 33mg 3%, Iron 1mg 8%, Potassium 163mg 3%

Source: https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/20739/banana-loaf/

RECIPE 632: Southern-Style Baked Banana Pudding
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 8
Yield: 1 10-inch pan
Prep Time: 30 mins
Cook Time: 15 mins
Total Time: 45 mins
Rating: 4.7/5
Category: /Desserts/Fruit Desserts/Banana Dessert Recipes/

INGREDIENTS:
• 4 large eggs

DIRECTIONS:
1. Separate eggs, placing the whites in the bowl of a stand mixer and the yolks into a saucepan
2. Add sugar, salt, and 1/3 cup plus 1 tablespoon flour to the yolks
3. Splash in about 1/4 of the milk and start blending mixture with a whisk
4. Pour in remaining milk and whisk until smooth
5. Cook and stir mixture over medium heat until hot to the touch, occasionally dipping your finger in to test
6. Whisk constantly until custard is thick enough to form ribbons
7. Remove custard from heat and add vanilla extract, banana liqueur, and cold butter
8. Whisk until butter dissolves
9. Set custard aside
10. Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
11. Toss banana slices with lemon juice
12. Spread a quarter of the custard over the bottom of a baking dish
13. Add a single layer of vanilla wafers
14. Cover with 1/2 of the bananas and spread 1/2 of the remaining custard on top
15. Add another layer of vanilla wafers, using slightly fewer this time
16. Top with the remaining bananas and custard
17. Smooth the top and tap dish against the counter to settle the pudding
18. Add cream of tartar to the egg whites
19. Beat using the whisk attachment until foamy
20. Gradually add sugar and beat until stiff, but not dry, peaks form
21. Spread meringue over the pudding using a soft spatula, creating ridges for contrast
22. Bake in the preheated oven until meringue is nicely browned, 7 to 10 minutes
23. Serve warm or chilled

NUTRITION INFO:
Total Fat 14g 17%, Saturated Fat 5g 23%, Cholesterol 102mg 34%, Sodium 272mg 12%, Total Carbohydrate 64g 23%, Dietary Fiber 2g 8%, Total Sugars 25g, Protein 8g, Vitamin C 4mg 22%, Calcium 99mg 8%, Iron 2mg 10%, Potassium 345mg 7%

Source: https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/273495/southern-style-baked-banana-pudding/

============================================================

------------------------------------------------------------

2. Pour into 2 glasses

NUTRITION INFO:

RECIPE 634: Simple Banana Bread
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 10
Yield: 1 8x4-inch loaf
Prep Time: 15 mins
Cook Time: 55 mins
Total Time: 1 hrs 20 mins
Rating: 4.0/5
Category: /Breakfast and Brunch/Breakfast Bread Recipes/

INGREDIENTS:
• cooking spray
• 2 cups all-purpose flour
• 1 teaspoon baking powder
• ½ teaspoon salt
• 4 ripe bananas
• mashed
• 2 large eggs
• ⅔ cup white sugar
• ½ cup chopped walnuts

DIRECTIONS:
1. Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
2. Grease an 8x4-inch loaf pan and set aside
3. Sift together flour, baking powder, and salt in a large bowl
4. Mash bananas in another bowl and stir in eggs and sugar
5. Stir the flour mixture into the banana mixture just to combine, then fold in walnuts
6. Pour the batter into the prepared pan
7. Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into the center of the bread comes out clean, 55 to 65 minutes
8. Remove from the oven and cool on a rack for 10 minutes, then remove from the pan and cool completely
9. Slice and serve

NUTRITION INFO:
Total Fat 5g 7%, Saturated Fat 1g 4%, Cholesterol 37mg 12%, Sodium 180mg 8%, Total Carbohydrate 44g 16%, Dietary Fiber 2g 8%, Total Sugars 19g, Protein 5g, Vitamin C 4mg 21%, Calcium 44mg 3%, Iron 2mg 9%, Potassium 235mg 5%

Source: https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/6757/simple-banana-bread/

RECIPE 635: Overnight Chia Oats
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 1
Prep Time: 5 mins
Total Time: 8 hrs 5 mins
Rating: 4.7/5

DIRECTIONS:

2. Seal with a lid and shake well
3. Refrigerate 8 hours to overnight

RECIPE 636: Easy Banana Brownies
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 16
Yield: 16 squares
Prep Time: 15 mins
Cook Time: 35 mins
Total Time: 50 mins
Rating: 4.5/5
Category: /Desserts/Fruit Desserts/Banana Dessert Recipes/

INGREDIENTS:
• ½ cup unsalted butter
• ⅔ cup semisweet chocolate chips
• 1 large egg
• ⅔ cup packed light brown sugar
• 1 small ripe banana
• mashed
• ½ teaspoon vanilla extract
• ¼ teaspoon salt
• ¾ cup all-purpose flour

DIRECTIONS:
1. Preheat the oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C)
2. Grease an 8-inch square baking pan
3. Melt butter in a saucepan over medium-low heat
4. Remove from the heat and stir in chocolate chips until melted
5. Set aside to cool for 5 minutes
6. While the chocolate mixture is cooling, lightly beat egg in a medium bowl
7. Stir in brown sugar, mashed banana, vanilla, and salt until well combined
8. Stir cooled melted chocolate mixture into banana mixture until well combined
9. Stir in flour until just incorporated
10. Spread batter into the prepared pan
11. Bake in the preheated oven until the top is dry and the edges have started to pull away from the sides of the pan, about 30 minutes
12. Let pan cool on a wire rack before cutting into 16 squares

NUTRITION INFO:
Total Fat 8g 11%, Saturated Fat 5g 25%, Cholesterol 27mg 9%, Sodium 85mg 4%, Total Carbohydrate 19g 7%, Dietary Fiber 1g 3%, Total Sugars 14g, Protein 1g, Vitamin C 1mg 3%, Calcium 14mg 1%, Iron 1mg 3%, Potassium 73mg 2%

Source: https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/159329/easy-banana-brownies/

============================================================

RECIPE 637: Easy Banana Loaf Cake
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 8
Yield: 1 loaf pan
Prep Time: 15 mins
Cook Time: 50 mins
Total Time: 1 hrs 5 mins
Rating: 4.7/5
Category: /Desserts/Fruit Desserts/Banana Dessert Recipes/

INGREDIENTS:
• 1 ½ cups all-purpose flour
• 1 cup white sugar
• ¼ cup butter
• softened
• 1 teaspoon vanilla extract
• 1 teaspoon baking soda
• ½ teaspoon baking powder
• 1 egg
• 3 very ripe bananas

DIRECTIONS:
1. Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
2. Grease and flour a 5x9-inch loaf pan
3. Mash bananas and add flour, sugar, butter, vanilla, baking powder, baking soda and egg
4. Pour into loaf pan
5. Bake in preheated oven until toothpick inserted into center of cake comes out clean, 50 to 60 minutes

NUTRITION INFO:
Total Fat 7g 9%, Saturated Fat 4g 20%, Cholesterol 39mg 13%, Sodium 238mg 10%, Total Carbohydrate 53g 19%, Dietary Fiber 2g 6%, Total Sugars 31g, Protein 4g, Vitamin C 4mg 19%, Calcium 28mg 2%, Iron 1mg 8%, Potassium 195mg 4%

RECIPE 638: Cream Cheese Banana Bread
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 8
Yield: 1 9x5-inch loaf
Prep Time: 20 mins
Cook Time: 50 mins
Total Time: 1 hrs 15 mins
Rating: 4.5/5
Category: /Bread/Quick Bread Recipes/Fruit Bread Recipes/Banana Bread/

INGREDIENTS:
• cooking spray

DIRECTIONS:
1. Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
2. Grease a 9x5-inch loaf pan with cooking spray
3. Combine butter, brown sugar, 1 egg, sour cream, 1/4 cup white sugar, and vanilla extract in a large bowl; whisk until smooth
4. Mash in bananas using a fork
5. Whisk in 1 cup flour, baking soda, baking powder, and salt until just combined
6. Whisk cream cheese, 1 egg, 1/4 cup white sugar, and 3 tablespoons flour together in a separate bowl
7. Pour half of the banana mixture into the prepared loaf pan
8. Spread cream cheese mixture evenly on top
9. Pour remaining banana mixture over cream cheese mixture
10. Bake in the preheated oven until top is firm, about 50 minutes
11. Cool in the pan, about 5 minutes

NUTRITION INFO:
Total Fat 20g 25%, Saturated Fat 12g 59%, Cholesterol 96mg 32%, Sodium 324mg 14%, Total Carbohydrate 48g 17%, Dietary Fiber 1g 5%, Total Sugars 30g, Protein 5g, Vitamin C 3mg 13%, Calcium 63mg 5%, Iron 2mg 8%, Potassium 192mg 4%

Source: https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/256401/cream-cheese-banana-bread/

RECIPE 639: Kiwi Jam
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 40
Yield: 5 cups
Prep Time: 10 mins
Cook Time: 30 mins
Total Time: 12 hrs 40 mins
Rating: 4.6/5
Category: /Side Dish/Sauces and Condiments/Canning and Preserving Recipes/Jams and Jellies Recipes/

INGREDIENTS:
• 24 kiwis
• peeled and mashed
• ¾ cup pineapple juice
• ¼ cup fresh lemon juice
• 3 apples
• unpeeled and halved
• 4 cups white sugar

DIRECTIONS:
1. In a large saucepan, combine 3 cups mashed kiwi, pineapple juice, lemon juice and apples
2. Bring to a boil and then add the sugar; stir to dissolve, reduce heat and simmer for 30 minutes
3. Sterilize the jars and lids in boiling water for at least 5 minutes
4. Pack the jam into the hot, sterilized jars, filling the jars to within 1/4 inch of the top
5. Run a knife or a thin spatula around the insides of the jars after they have been filled to remove any air bubbles
6. Wipe the rims of the jars with a moist paper towel to remove any food residue
7. Top with lids, and screw on rings
8. Place a rack in the bottom of a large stockpot and fill halfway with water
9. Bring to a boil over high heat, then carefully lower the jars into the pot using a holder
10. Leave a 2 inch space between the jars
11. Pour in more boiling water if necessary until the water level is at least 1 inch above the tops of the jars
12. Bring the water to a full boil, cover the pot, and process for 10 minutes

NUTRITION INFO:
Total Fat 0g 0%, Sodium 2mg 0%, Total Carbohydrate 29g 10%, Dietary Fiber 2g 6%, Total Sugars 26g, Protein 1g, Vitamin C 43mg 214%, Calcium 17mg 1%, Iron 0mg 1%, Potassium 158mg 3%

Source: https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/25904/kiwi-jam/

============================================================

RECIPE 641: PHILADELPHIA® Fruit Pizza
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 12
Yield: 12 wedges
Prep Time: 15 mins
Total Time: 2 hrs 59 mins
Rating: 4.9/5
Category: /Desserts/

INGREDIENTS:
• 1 (16.5 ounce) package refrigerated sliceable sugar cookies
• sliced
• 1 (8 ounce) package PHILADELPHIA Cream Cheese
• softened
• ¼ cup sugar
• ½ teaspoon vanilla
• 4 cups assorted cut-up fruit (kiwi
• strawberries
• blueberries
• drained canned mandarin oranges)
• ¼ cup apricot preserves
• pressed through sieve to remove lumps
• 1 tablespoon water

DIRECTIONS:
1. Heat oven to 375 degrees F
2. Line 12-inch pizza pan with foil; spray with cooking spray
3. Arrange cookie dough slices in single layer in prepared pan; press together to form crust
4. Bake 14 min.; cool completely
5. Invert onto plate; carefully remove foil
6. Turn crust over
7. Beat cream cheese, sugar and vanilla with mixer until well blended
8. Spread over crust
9. Top with fruit
10. Mix preserves and water; brush over fruit
11. Refrigerate 2 hours

NUTRITION INFO:
Total Fat 15g 20%, Saturated Fat 6g 29%, Cholesterol 25mg 8%, Sodium 218mg 9%, Total Carbohydrate 36g 13%, Dietary Fiber 1g 4%, Total Sugars 17g, Protein 3g, Vitamin C 30mg 149%, Calcium 9mg 1%, Iron 1mg 7%, Potassium 91mg 2%

Source: https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/136145/philadelphia-fruit-pizza/

RECIPE 642: Fruit Pizza Even Better
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 16
Prep Time: 30 mins
Cook Time: 15 mins
Total Time: 1 hrs 15 mins
Rating: 4.8/5
Category: /Desserts/Specialty Dessert Recipes/Fruit Pizza Recipes/

INGREDIENTS:
• butter-flavored cooking spray
• 2 cups all-purpose flour
• ½ cup confectioners' sugar
• 1 cup cold butter
• 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese
• softened
• ⅓ cup white sugar
• 1 teaspoon almond extract
• 2 cups sliced fresh strawberries
• 1 cup fresh blueberries
• 1 kiwi
• peeled and sliced
• 1 cup unsweetened pineapple juice
• ½ cup white sugar
• 2 tablespoons cornstarch
• 1 teaspoon lemon juice

DIRECTIONS:
1. Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
2. Lightly spray a 12-inch round pizza pan with butter-flavored cooking spray
3. Combine flour and confectioners' sugar in a bowl
4. Cut in butter with a knife or pastry blender until the mixture resembles coarse crumbs
5. Press into the prepared pizza pan to make a crust
6. Bake in the preheated oven until very lightly browned, 12 to 15 minutes
7. Cool on a wire rack
8. Beat cream cheese, 1/3 cup white sugar, and almond extract until smooth; spread over completely cooled crust
9. Arrange strawberries, blueberries, and kiwi decoratively over cream cheese mixture
10. Mix pineapple juice, 1/2 cup white sugar, cornstarch, and lemon juice in a saucepan until smooth; bring to a boil
11. Cook and stir until thickened, about 2 minutes
12. Cool slightly and drizzle over fruit
13. Refrigerate until chilled

NUTRITION INFO:
Total Fat 17g 21%, Saturated Fat 10g 52%, Cholesterol 46mg 15%, Sodium 124mg 5%, Total Carbohydrate 33g 12%, Dietary Fiber 1g 4%, Total Sugars 18g, Protein 3g, Vitamin C 19mg 96%, Calcium 25mg 2%, Iron 1mg 6%, Potassium 111mg 2%

Source: https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/228837/fruit-pizza-even-better/

============================================================

RECIPE 643: Fresh Fruit Tart with Mascarpone
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 16
Yield: 2 9-inch tarts
Prep Time: 30 mins
Cook Time: 15 mins
Total Time: 45 mins
Rating: 5.0/5
Category: /Desserts/Pies/Tarts/Fruit Tart Recipes/

INGREDIENTS:
• 2 cups all-purpose flour
• 1 cup butter
• softened
• ½ cup white sugar

DIRECTIONS:
1. Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
2. Lightly grease 2 tart pans
3. Blend flour, butter, and sugar together in a bowl using an electric mixer until combined
4. Divide mixture evenly and press into the bottoms of the prepared tart pans
5. Bake in the preheated oven until golden brown, 12 to 15 minutes
6. Let cool completely
7. While crusts are cooling, beat cream cheese, mascarpone cheese, sugar, vanilla extract, nutmeg, and cinnamon together in a bowl using an electric mixer until light and fluffy
8. Spread mixture over cooled crusts
9. Arrange strawberries, blackberries, and kiwis on tart in desired design
10. Mix sugar and cornstarch together in a small saucepan
11. Pour in water and lemon juice
12. Cook over medium heat until clear and thick, about 2 minutes
13. Let glaze cool completely
14. Glaze the entire top of each tart gently using a pastry brush

NUTRITION INFO:
Total Fat 23g 30%, Saturated Fat 14g 70%, Cholesterol 63mg 21%, Sodium 132mg 6%, Total Carbohydrate 43g 16%, Dietary Fiber 2g 8%, Total Sugars 28g, Protein 4g, Vitamin C 28mg 141%, Calcium 51mg 4%, Iron 1mg 6%, Potassium 141mg 3%

Source: https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/273048/fresh-fruit-tart-with-mascarpone/

RECIPE 644: Poblano and Ground Pork Tacos
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 6
Yield: 6 tacos
Prep Time: 30 mins
Cook Time: 10 mins
Total Time: 40 mins
Rating: 4.8/5
Category: /Main Dishes/Taco Recipes/

INGREDIENTS:
• 1 red onion
• halved and thinly sliced
• 1 Roma tomato
• seeded and finely chopped
• 1 ripe kiwi
• diced
• 1 lime
• quartered
• divided
• 2 tablespoons chopped cilantro
• divided
• salt and ground black pepper to taste
• 4 tablespoons sour cream
• olive oil
• 1 poblano pepper - cored
• seeded
• and finely chopped
• 10 ounces ground pork
• 1 tablespoon Mexican seasoning
• 2 tablespoons chicken stock
• 1 tablespoon tomato paste
• 6 flour tortillas

DIRECTIONS:
1. Mince a few slices of onion to get 1 tablespoon
2. Add minced onion, tomato, kiwi, juice from 2 lime wedges, 3/4 of the cilantro, salt, and pepper to a small bowl
3. Mix into a salsa
4. Juice 1/4 of the lime into another small bowl; mix in sour cream to make the crema
5. Heat olive oil in a large pan over medium-high heat
6. Add sliced onion and poblano pepper
7. Cook, tossing occasionally, until softened and lightly charred, 3 to 4 minutes
8. Add pork and Mexican seasoning
9. Cook until pork is browned throughout, 4 to 5 minutes
10. Reduce heat to medium-low
11. Add chicken stock, tomato paste, salt, and pepper
12. Cook and stir until everything is coated, 1 to 2 minutes
13. Wrap tortillas in a damp cloth and microwave for 30 seconds
14. Divide tortillas over plates; spread cream on top
15. Top tortillas with pork mixture and salsa
16. Garnish with remaining cilantro

NUTRITION INFO:
Total Fat 17g 22%, Saturated Fat 6g 28%, Cholesterol 35mg 12%, Sodium 660mg 29%, Total Carbohydrate 45g 16%, Dietary Fiber 4g 13%, Total Sugars 5g, Protein 15g, Vitamin C 25mg 125%, Calcium 127mg 10%, Iron 3mg 17%, Potassium 394mg 8%

Source: https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/269743/poblano-and-ground-pork-tacos/

============================================================

2. Combine spinach, nuts, strawberries, and kiwi in a salad bowl
3. Toss with raspberry dressing

RECIPE 647: Furutsu Sando (Fruit Sandwiches)
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 2
Yield: 2 sandwiches
Prep Time: 15 mins
Total Time: 1 hrs 15 mins
Rating: 4.0/5
Category: /Desserts/Fruit Desserts/

INGREDIENTS:
• ½ cup heavy whipping cream
• 1 tablespoon powdered sugar
• ½ teaspoon vanilla extract
• 4 slices Japanese milk bread
• crusts removed
• ½ cup sliced strawberries
• ½ cup peeled sliced kiwi
• ½ cup mandarin orange segments
• ½ cup halved seedless grapes

DIRECTIONS:
1. Beat cream, powdered sugar, and vanilla together in a bowl with an electric mixer on medium speed until stiff peaks form, 3 to 5 minutes
2. Spread 1 side of each bread slice with whipped cream
3. Arrange fruit pieces in a diagonal row on 2 of the bread slices, working from 1 corner to the opposite corner
4. Fill in the areas on both sides of the row with remaining fruit pieces, cutting to fit as necessary
5. Top with remaining bread slices, cream-sides down
6. Tightly wrap sandwiches in plastic wrap
7. Chill at least 1 hour, or up to 24 hours
8. Remove plastic wrap
9. With a serrated knife, carefully cut sandwich in half diagonally, slicing through the diagonal fruit row

NUTRITION INFO:
Total Fat 24g 31%, Saturated Fat 14g 71%, Cholesterol 82mg 27%, Sodium 369mg 16%, Total Carbohydrate 53g 19%, Dietary Fiber 4g 15%, Total Sugars 24g, Protein 7g, Vitamin C 90mg 449%, Calcium 147mg 11%, Iron 3mg 14%, Potassium 450mg 10%

Source: https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/284500/furutsu-sando-fruit-sandwiches/

RECIPE 648: Tropical Kiwi Ice Pops
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 6
Yield: 6 servings
Prep Time: 10 mins
Total Time: 8 hrs 10 mins
Rating: 4.8/5
Category: /Desserts/Fruit Desserts/Banana Dessert Recipes/

INGREDIENTS:
• 1 (14 ounce) can coconut milk
• 3 tablespoons white sugar
• 1 (8 ounce) can crushed pineapple
• 1 banana
• chopped
• 1 cup chopped kiwi fruit

DIRECTIONS:
1. Stir coconut milk and sugar together in a bowl
2. Pour coconut milk mixture into a blender
3. Add pineapple and banana; blend until smooth
4. Pour blended mixture into ice pop molds
5. Press kiwi into the coconut mixture; freeze until solid, 8 hours to overnight

NUTRITION INFO:
Total Fat 14g 18%, Saturated Fat 12g 62%, Sodium 10mg 0%, Total Carbohydrate 23g 8%, Dietary Fiber 2g 9%, Total Sugars 17g, Protein 2g, Vitamin C 33mg 167%, Calcium 28mg 2%, Iron 2mg 13%, Potassium 352mg 7%

Source: https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/237750/tropical-kiwi-ice-pops/

============================================================

RECIPE 649: Kiwi-Lime Pork Ribs
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 6
Yield: 6 servings
Prep Time: 10 mins
Cook Time: 1 hrs
Total Time: 1 hrs 10 mins
Rating: 4.7/5
Category: /Meat and Poultry/Pork/Pork Rib Recipes/Country-Style Ribs/

INGREDIENTS:
• 2 kiwis
• peeled and sliced
• ½ cup white sugar
• 2 tablespoons cider vinegar
• 2 tablespoons lime juice
• 2 tablespoons salt
• 2 tablespoons chili powder
• 2 tablespoons cornstarch
• 1 clove garlic
• minced
• 1 (3 pound) package country-style pork ribs

DIRECTIONS:
1. Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
2. Blend kiwis, sugar, vinegar, lime juice, salt, chili powder, cornstarch, and garlic in a blender until thickened into a sauce
3. Place pork ribs on a baking sheet
4. Drizzle blended kiwi sauce over ribs
5. Loosely cover ribs with a sheet of aluminum foil
6. Cook in preheated oven until tender, about 1 hour

NUTRITION INFO:
Total Fat 31g 39%, Saturated Fat 11g 56%, Cholesterol 120mg 40%, Sodium 2446mg 106%, Total Carbohydrate 25g 9%, Dietary Fiber 2g 6%, Total Sugars 19g, Protein 30g, Vitamin C 26mg 132%, Calcium 66mg 5%, Iron 2mg 13%, Potassium 458mg 10%

Source: https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/221315/kiwi-lime-pork-ribs/

1. Blend the carrot, banana, kiwi, apple, pineapple, and ice cubes in a blender until smooth

RECIPE 651: Spicy Fruit Salsa
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 12
Yield: 12 servings
Prep Time: 15 mins
Total Time: 15 mins
Rating: 4.4/5
Category: /Appetizers and Snacks/Dips and Spreads Recipes/Salsa Recipes/

INGREDIENTS:
• 5 kiwis
• peeled and diced
• 1 quart strawberries
• finely chopped
• 1 pint fresh blackberries
• chopped
• 4 Granny Smith apples - peeled
• cored and coarsely shredded
• 2 tablespoons any flavor fruit jelly
• ¾ cup brown sugar
• 1 tablespoon cayenne pepper
• 3 tablespoons habanero hot sauce
• 1 (7 ounce) can green salsa
• ⅓ cup lime juice

DIRECTIONS:
1. Place kiwis, strawberries, blackberries, and apples in a bowl
2. Stir in jelly, brown sugar, cayenne pepper, hot sauce, green salsa, and lime juice
3. Stir together

NUTRITION INFO:
Total Fat 1g 1%, Sodium 149mg 6%, Total Carbohydrate 34g 12%, Dietary Fiber 4g 15%, Total Sugars 27g, Protein 1g, Vitamin C 71mg 356%, Calcium 42mg 3%, Iron 1mg 4%, Potassium 307mg 7%

Source: https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/88461/spicy-fruit-salsa/

RECIPE 652: Pavlova Deluxe
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 8
Yield: 1 8-inch pavlova
Rating: 4.8/5
Category: /Desserts/Specialty Dessert Recipes/Pavlova Recipes/

INGREDIENTS:
• 6 egg whites
• ⅛ teaspoon cream of tartar
• 1 cup white sugar
• 1 tablespoon cornstarch
• 2 teaspoons distilled white vinegar
• 1 ¼ cups heavy cream
• chilled
• 1 teaspoon vanilla extract
• 2 teaspoons confectioners' sugar
• 4 passion fruits

DIRECTIONS:
1. Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (205 degrees C)
2. Grease interior of 8 inch springform pan and dust lightly with cornstarch
3. Beat egg whites, preferably in a glass or ceramic bowl, until stiff and glossy
4. Make sure egg whites have absolutely no contact with grease (fresh or residual), or even a speck of yolk
5. Combine cream of tartar, white sugar, and cornstarch; gradually beat in to the egg whites
6. Sprinkle vinegar over egg white mixture, then fold it in very gently
7. Pile meringue into prepared pan
8. Spread to the sides leaving a slight depression in the center
9. Place in preheated oven
10. Close the oven door, and immediately turn oven down to 250 degrees F (120 degrees C)
11. Bake for 75 to 90 minutes
12. Open oven door, but leave meringue in the oven for 15 more minutes
13. Remove meringue to a draft free spot
14. Very carefully remove rim of springform pan, and allow meringue to cool completely
15. There may be a slight sinking in the center
16. Carefully remove meringue from pan base, and place on serving platter
17. Whip cream, vanilla extract, and confectioners' sugar until thick and firm
18. Gently spread over the meringue
19. Remove the pulp from the passion fruit, and spoon over cream
20. If using kiwi, peel and slice the fruit; arrange slightly overlapping slices in a pleasing design
21. Chill until serving time

NUTRITION INFO:
Total Fat 14g 18%, Saturated Fat 9g 43%, Cholesterol 51mg 17%, Sodium 58mg 3%, Total Carbohydrate 30g 11%, Dietary Fiber 1g 3%, Total Sugars 27g, Protein 4g, Vitamin C 3mg 15%, Calcium 27mg 2%, Iron 0mg 1%, Potassium 109mg 2%

Source: https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/12138/pavlova-deluxe/

============================================================

RECIPE 653: White Sangria with Kiwi
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 8
Yield: 8 servings
Prep Time: 20 mins
Total Time: 20 mins
Rating: 4.3/5
Category: /Drinks Recipes/Sangria Recipes/

INGREDIENTS:
• 1 (750 milliliter) bottle Chardonnay wine
• 1 liter club soda
• 3 tablespoons orange-flavored liqueur (such as Cointreau®)
• 2 tablespoons white sugar
• 1 cup seedless green grapes
• 2 kiwis
• peeled and sliced
• 1 large pear
• thinly sliced
• ice cubes
• 8 sprigs mint

DIRECTIONS:
1. Mix Chardonnay wine, club soda, orange-flavored liqueur, sugar, grapes, kiwis, and pear in a large pitcher
2. Stir until sugar is dissolved
3. Pour wine mixture into wine glasses filled with ice, making sure each glass has some fruit
4. Garnish with mint sprigs

NUTRITION INFO:
Total Fat 0g 0%, Sodium 10mg 0%, Total Carbohydrate 19g 7%, Dietary Fiber 2g 6%, Total Sugars 14g, Protein 1g, Vitamin C 22mg 112%, Calcium 29mg 2%, Iron 1mg 3%, Potassium 200mg 4%

Source: https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/222834/white-sangria-with-kiwi/

RECIPE 654: Strawberry Kiwi Tartlets
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 12
Yield: 12 servings
Prep Time: 25 mins
Cook Time: 30 mins
Total Time: 55 mins
Rating: 4.4/5
Category: /Desserts/Pies/Tarts/Fruit Tart Recipes/

INGREDIENTS:
• 1 egg
• 2 teaspoons water
• 12 frozen puff pastry shells
• thawed
• ⅓ cup strawberry preserves
• 2 pints fresh strawberries
• sliced
• 4 kiwis
• peeled and seeded
• 2 tablespoons honey
• ½ cup heavy cream
• 2 teaspoons confectioners' sugar

DIRECTIONS:
1. Beat together the egg and water in a bowl
2. Brush the puff pastry shells with the egg mixture, and bake shells according to package directions
3. Melt the preserves in a saucepan over low heat
4. Remove from heat, and stir in the strawberry slices
5. In a food processor, blend the kiwis and honey until smooth
6. In a large bowl, beat together the cream and sugar until stiff peaks form
7. Fill each puff pastry shell with strawberries, drizzle with kiwi sauce, and top with whipped cream to serve

NUTRITION INFO:
Total Fat 17g 22%, Saturated Fat 6g 30%, Cholesterol 29mg 10%, Sodium 241mg 10%, Total Carbohydrate 34g 12%, Dietary Fiber 3g 10%, Total Sugars 16g, Protein 5g, Vitamin C 59mg 293%, Calcium 27mg 2%, Iron 2mg 11%, Potassium 185mg 4%

Source: https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/79883/strawberry-kiwi-tartlets/

============================================================

RECIPE 655: LaWanna's Mango Salsa on Tilapia Fillets
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 4
Yield: 4 servings
Prep Time: 30 mins
Cook Time: 10 mins
Total Time: 40 mins
Rating: 4.0/5
Category: /Seafood/Fish/Tilapia/

INGREDIENTS:
• ½ fresh pineapple - peeled
• cored
• and chopped
• ½ pound strawberries
• quartered
• 3 kiwifruit
• peeled and diced
• 1 large mango - peeled
• seeded and diced
• ½ cup grape tomatoes
• 2 tablespoons finely chopped fresh cilantro
• 1 tablespoon balsamic vinegar
• 1 ½ pounds tilapia fillets
• ½ teaspoon seasoned pepper blend

DIRECTIONS:
1. In a bowl, toss together the pineapple, strawberries, kiwifruit, mango, tomatoes, cilantro, and balsamic vinegar
2. Spray a skillet with cooking spray, and heat over medium-high heat
3. Sprinkle tilapia fillets with seasoned pepper blend, and pan-fry until fish turns white and opaque, 2 to 3 minutes per side
4. Serve fish topped with salsa

NUTRITION INFO:
Total Fat 3g 4%, Saturated Fat 1g 3%, Cholesterol 63mg 21%, Sodium 84mg 4%, Total Carbohydrate 35g 13%, Dietary Fiber 5g 19%, Total Sugars 26g, Protein 37g, Vitamin C 140mg 702%, Calcium 100mg 8%, Iron 1mg 6%, Potassium 1190mg 25%

Source: https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/215013/lawannas-mango-salsa-on-tilapia-fillets/

RECIPE 656: A Drama Queen's Pavlova
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 12
Yield: 12 servings
Prep Time: 30 mins
Cook Time: 50 mins
Total Time: 1 hrs 20 mins
Rating: 4.4/5
Category: /Desserts/Specialty Dessert Recipes/Pavlova Recipes/

INGREDIENTS:
• 6 egg whites
• 1 pinch salt
• 1 ½ teaspoons vinegar
• 2 cups castor sugar or superfine sugar
• 1 ½ teaspoons vanilla extract
• ½ cup unsweetened flaked coconut (Optional)
• 2 cups sweetened whipped cream
• 1 cup fresh strawberries
• sliced
• 2 kiwifruit
• peeled
• halved lengthwise
• and sliced
• 1 fresh peach - peeled
• pitted and sliced
• ½ cup fresh blueberries

DIRECTIONS:
1. Preheat the oven to 450 degrees F (220 degrees C)
2. You will be turning the temperature down to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C) when you put this in to bake
3. Line a 9 or 10 inch round glass dish with parchment paper
4. Combine the egg whites and salt in a large bowl
5. Beat with an electric mixer, or stand mixer using a whisk attachment until able to form soft peaks
6. Sprinkle in the sugar 1 tablespoon at a time while continuing to whip to stiff peaks
7. Stir in the vanilla and vinegar, and fold in coconut if using
8. Spread evenly into the prepared glass dish, making sure to spread out to all of the edges
9. Place the Pavlova into the oven, and immediately reduce the temperature to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C)
10. Bake for 40 to 50 minutes, or until the top is crisp and a pale straw color
11. Leave in the oven, and turn off the heat
12. Let it stay in the oven until the oven has cooled completely
13. Once the Pavlova is cooled, top generously with sweetened whipped cream
14. Arrange the strawberries, kiwis, peaches and blueberries in beautiful concentric circles on top

NUTRITION INFO:
Total Fat 5g 6%, Saturated Fat 4g 18%, Cholesterol 8mg 3%, Sodium 56mg 2%, Total Carbohydrate 40g 14%, Dietary Fiber 1g 5%, Total Sugars 37g, Protein 3g, Vitamin C 23mg 116%, Calcium 20mg 2%, Iron 0mg 2%, Potassium 129mg 3%

Source: https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/83706/a-drama-queens-pavlova/

============================================================

RECIPE 657: Creamy Kiwi Sandwich
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 8
Yield: 8 sandwiches
Prep Time: 20 mins
Total Time: 20 mins
Rating: 4.0/5
Category: /Main Dishes/Sandwich Recipes/

INGREDIENTS:
• 1 (8 ounce) package Neufchatel cheese
• 2 teaspoons lemon zest
• finely chopped
• 2 tablespoons honey
• or to taste
• 1 cup chopped kiwi fruit
• 16 slices whole wheat bread

DIRECTIONS:
1. In a small bowl, mix together Neufchatel cheese, lemon zest, and honey
2. Refrigerate for 1 day to allow the flavors to develop
3. Spread about 2 tablespoons of the sweetened Neufchatel cheese over one side of a slice of bread
4. Top with about 2 tablespoons of chopped kiwi fruit, and another slice of bread
5. Repeat with remaining ingredients to make 8 sandwiches in all

NUTRITION INFO:
Total Fat 9g 11%, Saturated Fat 5g 23%, Cholesterol 21mg 7%, Sodium 381mg 17%, Total Carbohydrate 32g 12%, Dietary Fiber 5g 16%, Total Sugars 10g, Protein 10g, Vitamin C 21mg 106%, Calcium 90mg 7%, Iron 2mg 9%, Potassium 245mg 5%

Source: https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/88398/creamy-kiwi-sandwich/

RECIPE 658: Char Siu (Chinese Barbeque Pork)
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 4
Yield: 4 servings
Prep Time: 15 mins
Cook Time: 1 hrs 10 mins
Total Time: 2 days 1 hrs 25 mins
Rating: 5.0/5
Category: /Cuisine/Asian/Chinese/

INGREDIENTS:
• 2 tablespoons honey
• 2 tablespoons Shaoxing cooking wine
• 1 tablespoon hoisin sauce
• 1 tablespoon pureed kiwi
• 1 tablespoon Chinese dark soy sauce
• 1 tablespoon Thai chile sauce
• 2 cloves garlic
• grated
• 2 teaspoons oyster sauce
• ½ teaspoon Chinese five-spice powder
• 1 ½ pounds pork belly
• skin removed

DIRECTIONS:
1. Mix honey, cooking wine, hoisin sauce, kiwi, dark soy sauce, chile sauce, garlic, oyster sauce, and five-spice powder together in a large resealable plastic bag
2. Add pork belly
3. Seal bag, pressing out as much air as possible
4. Place bag on a plate and marinate pork belly in the refrigerator, flipping occasionally, for at least 2 days
5. Preheat oven to 275 degrees F (135 degrees C) with a rack in the upper third of the oven
6. Set a wire rack on a rimmed baking sheet
7. Place pork belly on the wire rack, reserving marinade
8. Bake pork belly in the preheated oven until the internal temperature reaches 160 degrees F (71 degrees C), about 1 hour
9. Remove pork belly from the oven; baste with reserved marinade
10. Move oven rack to the top position and preheat the oven's broiler
11. Broil pork until it is dark and glossy and the edges start to blacken, about 5 minutes
12. Flip and baste on the second side
13. Continue broiling until second side darkens and starts to blacken, about 5 minutes more
14. Slice with a sharp knife

NUTRITION INFO:
Total Fat 24g 30%, Saturated Fat 8g 39%, Cholesterol 62mg 21%, Sodium 1809mg 79%, Total Carbohydrate 13g 5%, Dietary Fiber 0g 1%, Total Sugars 10g, Protein 21g, Vitamin C 5mg 23%, Calcium 15mg 1%, Iron 1mg 7%, Potassium 345mg 7%

Source: https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/257428/char-siu-chinese-barbeque-pork/

============================================================

RECIPE 659: Strawberry-Kiwi Slush
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 3
Yield: 24 ounces
Prep Time: 5 mins
Total Time: 5 mins
Rating: 4.0/5
Category: /Drinks Recipes/Slushie Recipes/

INGREDIENTS:
• 2 cups crushed ice
• ¾ pint fresh strawberries
• hulled
• ¾ cup grape juice (such as Welch's®)
• 1 large kiwi fruit
• peeled
• ¼ cup water
• ¼ cup lemon juice

DIRECTIONS:
1. Blend ice, strawberries, grape juice, kiwi fruit, water, and lemon juice in a blender until it reaches an even slush consistency, 25 to 35 seconds

NUTRITION INFO:
Total Fat 1g 1%, Sodium 5mg 0%, Total Carbohydrate 23g 8%, Dietary Fiber 3g 10%, Total Sugars 17g, Protein 1g, Vitamin C 90mg 450%, Calcium 32mg 2%, Iron 1mg 3%, Potassium 340mg 7%

RECIPE 660: Lemon Pretzel Salad with Mango and Kiwi
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 12
Yield: 1 9x13-inch baking dish
Prep Time: 20 mins
Cook Time: 10 mins
Total Time: 4 hrs
Rating: 4.4/5
Category: /Desserts/Specialty Dessert Recipes/Dessert Salad Recipes/Jell-O® Salad/

INGREDIENTS:
• 2 cups crushed pretzels
• ¾ cup butter
• melted
• 3 tablespoons brown sugar

DIRECTIONS:
1. Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
2. Mix crushed pretzels, butter, and brown sugar together in a bowl; press into a 9x13-inch baking dish
3. Bake in the preheated oven for 10 minutes; set aside to cool completely
4. Crust will be soft when taken out of the oven and will harden as it cools
5. Mix white sugar, cream cheese, and vanilla extract together in a large bowl until smooth
6. Stir juice from 1/2 lemon and lemon zest into cream cheese mixture and mix well; fold in whipped topping
7. Spread cream cheese mixture evenly over cooled crust; refrigerate until set, about 30 minutes
8. Mix boiling water and lemon-flavored gelatin mix together in a bowl until dissolved
9. Add 1/2 cup strained lemon juice and mix well
10. Refrigerate gelatin mixture until slightly thickened, about 1 hour
11. Ladle enough gelatin mixture over cream cheese layer to cover, setting remaining gelatin mixture aside
12. Arrange mango and kiwi onto gelatin mixture layer and pour remaining gelatin mixture over fruit layer
13. Refrigerate until completely chilled and set, about 2 hours

NUTRITION INFO:
Total Fat 23g 30%, Saturated Fat 16g 78%, Cholesterol 51mg 17%, Sodium 461mg 20%, Total Carbohydrate 52g 19%, Dietary Fiber 1g 3%, Total Sugars 39g, Protein 5g, Vitamin C 14mg 72%, Calcium 33mg 3%, Iron 1mg 5%, Potassium 107mg 2%

Source: https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/242187/lemon-pretzel-salad-with-mango-and-kiwi/

============================================================

RECIPE 661: Simple Strawberry Salsa
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 10
Yield: 10 servings
Prep Time: 15 mins
Total Time: 45 mins
Rating: 5.0/5
Category: /Appetizers and Snacks/Dips and Spreads Recipes/Fruit Dip/

INGREDIENTS:
• 1 tablespoon lemon juice
• 1 ½ teaspoons white sugar
• 1 cup finely chopped strawberries
• 1 (8 ounce) can unsweetened crushed pineapple
• drained
• 3 kiwis
• peeled and finely chopped
• 1 naval orange
• peeled and cut into small pieces

DIRECTIONS:
1. Stir lemon juice and sugar together in a bowl to dissolve the sugar; add strawberries, pineapple, kiwis, and orange pieces and stir to coat in the lemon juice mixture
2. Cover bowl with plastic wrap and refrigerate at least 30 minutes

NUTRITION INFO:
Total Fat 0g 0%, Sodium 1mg 0%, Total Carbohydrate 11g 4%, Dietary Fiber 2g 6%, Total Sugars 8g, Protein 1g, Vitamin C 42mg 211%, Calcium 20mg 2%, Iron 0mg 1%, Potassium 154mg 3%

Source: https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/238427/simple-strawberry-salsa/

RECIPE 662: Kale with Kiwi
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 2
Yield: 2 servings
Prep Time: 20 mins
Cook Time: 10 mins
Total Time: 30 mins
Rating: 4.1/5
Category: /Side Dish/Vegetables/Greens/

INGREDIENTS:
• 2 teaspoons coconut oil
• 2 cloves garlic
• chopped
• 1 teaspoon minced fresh ginger
• ¼ teaspoon sea salt
• ½ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper
• 2 kiwis
• peeled and coarsely chopped
• 1 tablespoon fresh oregano leaves
• 1 bunch lacinato (dinosaur) kale
• washed and sliced thin
• 2 tablespoons blanched slivered almonds

DIRECTIONS:
1. Heat coconut oil in a skillet over medium-high heat
2. Add garlic, ginger, sea salt and freshly ground black pepper; cook and stir until garlic begins to turn color, about 3 minutes
3. Stir in chopped kiwi and oregano leaves and cook for another 2 minutes
4. Add kale; lower heat to medium and cook until kale is dark green and tender, about 5 minutes
5. Stir in slivered almonds and adjust seasonings to taste

NUTRITION INFO:
Total Fat 10g 13%, Saturated Fat 5g 23%, Sodium 381mg 17%, Total Carbohydrate 33g 12%, Dietary Fiber 7g 25%, Total Sugars 7g, Protein 9g, Vitamin C 364mg 1,821%, Calcium 519mg 40%, Iron 10mg 56%, Potassium 1322mg 28%

Source: https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/230406/kale-with-kiwi/

============================================================

------------------------------------------------------------

Yield: 1 servings
Prep Time: 10 mins

• 1 banana
• chopped
• 1 kiwi

• ¼ cup cream of coconut
• 1 tablespoon coconut flakes for garnish

DIRECTIONS:

NUTRITION INFO:
Total Fat 2g 3%, Saturated Fat 1g 7%, Sodium 18mg 1%, Total Carbohydrate 57g 21%, Dietary Fiber 8g 30%, Total Sugars 35g, Protein 3g, Vitamin C 164mg 819%, Calcium 55mg 4%, Iron 1mg 7%, Potassium 878mg 19%

RECIPE 664: Healthier Absolutely the Best Chocolate Chip Cookies
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 24
Yield: 2 dozen cookies
Prep Time: 20 mins
Cook Time: 10 mins
Total Time: 30 mins
Rating: 4.0/5
Category: /Desserts/Cookies/Chocolate Chip Cookie Recipes/

INGREDIENTS:
• ½ cup butter
• 1 kiwi
• pureed
• ½ cup brown sugar
• ½ cup white sugar
• 2 eggs
• 2 teaspoons Mexican vanilla extract
• 2 ¼ cups all-purpose flour
• 1 teaspoon baking soda
• 1 cup toasted oat cereal (such as Cheerios ®)
• smashed
• 2 cups milk chocolate chips

DIRECTIONS:
1. Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
2. Grease two baking sheets
3. Cream together the butter, kiwi, brown sugar and white sugar in a large bowl, until light and fluffy
4. Add the eggs one at a time, beating well with each addition, then stir in the vanilla extract
5. Combine flour, baking soda, and toasted oat cereal in a bowl; gradually stir into the creamed mixture
6. Finally, fold in the chocolate chips
7. Drop by rounded spoonfuls onto the prepared baking sheets
8. Bake in preheated oven until light brown, about 8 to 10 minutes
9. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely

NUTRITION INFO:
Total Fat 9g 12%, Saturated Fat 5g 27%, Cholesterol 30mg 10%, Sodium 119mg 5%, Total Carbohydrate 28g 10%, Dietary Fiber 1g 2%, Total Sugars 17g, Protein 3g, Vitamin C 3mg 16%, Calcium 34mg 3%, Iron 1mg 6%, Potassium 43mg 1%

Source: https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/219436/healthier-absolutely-the-best-chocolate-chip-cookies/

============================================================

RECIPE 665: Fruit Pizza Trifles To Go
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 25
Yield: 25 trifles
Prep Time: 30 mins
Total Time: 1 hrs
Rating: 4.8/5
Category: /Desserts/Specialty Dessert Recipes/Trifle Recipes/

INGREDIENTS:
• 4 (8 ounce) packages reduced-fat cream cheese
• softened
• 2 cups brown sugar
• 4 teaspoons vanilla extract
• 1 pound fresh strawberries
• coarsely chopped
• 1 fresh pineapple - peeled
• cored and chopped
• 1 pound seedless grapes
• halved
• 1 pint blueberries
• 25 clear
• plastic (10 ounce) cups
• 12 sugar cookies
• crushed
• 2 kiwis
• peeled and sliced

DIRECTIONS:
1. Mix cream cheese, brown sugar, and vanilla extract in a bowl until smooth
2. Refrigerate until cold, about 30 minutes
3. In a separate bowl, lightly mix together the chopped strawberries, pineapple, grapes, and the blueberries
4. Scoop about 3 tablespoons of the cream cheese mixture into the bottom of each plastic cup to make a half-inch thick layer
5. Spoon enough mixed fruit on top of the cream cheese to make a 2-inch layer, about 1/3 cup
6. Top the fruit with a teaspoon or two of crumbled sugar cookies
7. Garnish each trifle with a kiwi slice
8. Refrigerate until serving time

NUTRITION INFO:
Total Fat 8g 11%, Saturated Fat 5g 23%, Cholesterol 24mg 8%, Sodium 138mg 6%, Total Carbohydrate 34g 12%, Dietary Fiber 2g 7%, Total Sugars 23g, Protein 5g, Vitamin C 46mg 228%, Calcium 67mg 5%, Iron 1mg 7%, Potassium 231mg 5%

Source: https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/218710/fruit-pizza-trifles-to-go/

============================================================

RECIPE 666: Sweet Salsa and Cinnamon Chips
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 5
Yield: 5 servings
Prep Time: 20 mins
Cook Time: 10 mins
Total Time: 30 mins
Rating: 4.6/5
Category: /Appetizers and Snacks/Snacks/Kids/Healthy/

INGREDIENTS:
• 10 frozen strawberries
• 2 kiwi
• peeled and chopped
• ½ medium mango - peeled and diced
• 1 ½ bananas
• peeled and diced
• 3 (12 inch) flour tortillas
• canola cooking spray
• 1 cup cinnamon sugar

DIRECTIONS:
1. Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
2. Combine the kiwi, mango, and banana in a bowl
3. Process the strawberries in a blender until they are liquefied and pour over fruit mixture
4. Stir to coat and refrigerate
5. Coat both sides of each tortilla with the cooking spray
6. Cut them into triangle-shaped wedges and place on a baking sheet
7. Sprinkle cinnamon sugar evenly over the chips
8. Bake in preheated oven until golden-brown, about 10 minutes
9. Allow to cool and serve with the fruit mixture

NUTRITION INFO:
Total Fat 6g 7%, Saturated Fat 1g 7%, Sodium 450mg 20%, Total Carbohydrate 94g 34%, Dietary Fiber 5g 17%, Total Sugars 12g, Protein 7g, Vitamin C 45mg 225%, Calcium 108mg 8%, Iron 3mg 15%, Potassium 392mg 8%

Source: https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/142879/sweet-salsa-and-cinnamon-chips/

============================================================

RECIPE 667: Tart Tropical Parfait
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 1
Yield: 1 parfait
Prep Time: 5 mins
Total Time: 5 mins
Rating: 5.0/5
Category: /Desserts/Specialty Dessert Recipes/Parfait Recipes/

INGREDIENTS:
• 1 (5.3 ounce) container low-fat vanilla Greek yogurt
• ½ cup chopped kiwi
• 2 tablespoons chopped macadamia nuts
• 1 teaspoon agave nectar
• 1 teaspoon chopped fresh mint

DIRECTIONS:
1. Spoon 1/3 cup yogurt into a 6- to 8-ounce parfait glass or jar
2. Top yogurt with 1/2 of the kiwi, 1/2 of the macadamia nuts, 1/2 of the agave
3. Repeat layers with the remaining yogurt, kiwi, nuts, and agave
4. Top parfait with mint

NUTRITION INFO:
Total Fat 13g 17%, Saturated Fat 2g 11%, Cholesterol 9mg 3%, Sodium 74mg 3%, Total Carbohydrate 37g 13%, Dietary Fiber 4g 16%, Total Sugars 28g, Protein 15g, Vitamin C 83mg 413%, Calcium 46mg 4%, Iron 1mg 5%, Potassium 339mg 7%

Source: https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/285020/tart-tropical-parfait/

============================================================

RECIPE 668: Grilled Tilapia with Mango Salsa
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 2
Prep Time: 45 mins
Cook Time: 10 mins
Total Time: 1 hrs 55 mins
Rating: 4.8/5
Category: /Seafood/Fish/Tilapia/

INGREDIENTS:
• ⅓ cup extra-virgin olive oil
• 1 tablespoon lemon juice
• 1 tablespoon minced fresh parsley
• 1 clove garlic
• minced
• 1 teaspoon dried basil
• 1 teaspoon ground black pepper
• ½ teaspoon salt
• 2 (6 ounce) tilapia fillets

DIRECTIONS:
1. Prepare the fish: Whisk together olive oil, lemon juice, parsley, garlic, basil, black pepper, and salt in a bowl and pour into a resealable plastic bag
2. Add tilapia fillets, coat with the marinade, squeeze out excess air, and seal the bag
3. Marinate in the refrigerator for 1 hour
4. Meanwhile, make the salsa: Combine mango, bell pepper, jalapeño pepper, red onion, and cilantro in a bowl
5. Add lime and lemon juices and toss well
6. Season to taste with salt and pepper
7. Refrigerate until ready to serve
8. Preheat an outdoor grill for medium-high heat and lightly oil the grate
9. Remove tilapia from the marinade and shake off excess
10. Discard remaining marinade
11. Grill fillets until fish is no longer translucent in the center and flakes easily with a fork, 3 to 4 minutes per side, depending on the thickness of the fillets
12. Serve tilapia topped with mango salsa

NUTRITION INFO:
Total Fat 40g 52%, Saturated Fat 6g 29%, Cholesterol 62mg 21%, Sodium 697mg 30%, Total Carbohydrate 33g 12%, Dietary Fiber 4g 16%, Total Sugars 25g, Protein 36g, Vitamin C 102mg 511%, Calcium 100mg 8%, Iron 1mg 8%, Potassium 1123mg 24%

Source: https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/166771/grilled-tilapia-with-mango-salsa/

============================================================

RECIPE 669: Jicama Mango Salad with Cilantro and Lime
------------------------------------------------------------
Servings: 8
Yield: 8 servings
Prep Time: 30 mins
Total Time: 45 mins
Rating: 4.9/5
Category: /Salad/Vegetable Salad Recipes/

INGREDIENTS:
• 1 large jicama
• peeled and cut into matchsticks
• 1 small red bell pepper
• cut into matchsticks
• 1 large firm mango
• peeled and cut into matchsticks
• ½ red onion
• cut into matchsticks

DIRECTIONS:
1. Toss jicama, red pepper, mango, and red onion together in a large bowl
2. Stir cilantro, lime juice, honey, salt, and cayenne pepper together in a bowl
3. Pour the cilantro mixture over the jicama mixture and toss to coat
4. Cover the bowl with plastic wrap and refrigerate for at least 15 minutes

NUTRITION INFO:
Total Fat 0g 0%, Saturated Fat 0g 1%, Sodium 300mg 13%, Total Carbohydrate 32g 11%, Dietary Fiber 9g 32%, Total Sugars 18g, Protein 2g, Vitamin C 58mg 292%, Calcium 32mg 2%, Iron 1mg 7%, Potassium 354mg 8%
